
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52411786">
<strong><br>
</strong><strong>序</strong>「ximagine」在本篇文章中将介绍「荒岛」目前所使用的显示器测试流程及标准，我们主要使用Calman、DisplayCAL、i1Profiler等软件及CA410、Spyder X、i1Pro 2等设备，是我们目前制作内容数据的重要来源，当然这不是唯一的选择，还可以使用尊正Colourspace或者Admesy Prometheus以及积分球软件设备等。我们深知做的仍是比较表面的活儿，和工程师、科研人员相比有着不小的差距，当然我们的也有用大白话让大家都看明白的优势。总的来说是测试设备分为色度计和分光光度计两种类型，色度计使用RGB三色滤色片获取光谱数据，但在同色异谱方面，因为只能获取RGB滤色的结果，所以无法识别同色异谱等现象，分光光度计使用31块滤色镜或者光栅获取全光谱的数据。测试并不复杂，但是相当繁琐，收集整理测试无不花费大量时间精力，内容不完善或者有错误的地方，希望大佬指出我们好改进。如果本内容对您有所帮助，麻烦三连支持一下，十分感谢。网上冲浪久了，键盘侠见的也就多了；他们不仅自己不行，还质疑你不行。<strong>准备工作</strong><strong>一、显示器相关</strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将显示器恢复出厂设置。</li><li>显示器需要通电点亮预热至少半小时。</li><li>显示器播放纯白色画面。<br>
</li></ul><strong>二、设置相关</strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>在电脑电源计划里，开启最佳性能。</li><li>电源选项更改为从不关闭显示器和睡眠。</li><li>当测试笔记本时，请关闭英特尔驱动中的节能选项，此功能会导致笔记本仅使用电池的时，屏幕色彩产生发白现象。</li><li>使用带宽最大的显示器接口连接显卡，接着优先开启最高刷新率，并将色深开至最高档位。<br>
</li></ul><strong>三、其他相关</strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>室内温度 15°-20°。</li><li>全黑环境，避免外界光源照射到正在测试的显示器上。</li><li>所有数据以测试电脑为准，单款显示器测试完整数据后同步到云盘里，每款显示器以品牌区分，再以型号区分，测试前建好文件夹。</li><li>所有测试设备使用完毕后需要放回原处，每一个项目开始测试前，在型号文件夹里新建以测试软件命名的文件夹。</li><li>名字符号书写规范：sRGB、DCI P3、Adobe RGB、300nit、1000:1、SDR、HDR、5ms、Ksf-WLED、DC、PWM、QD 量子点、6500K、8Bit、180Hz、Delta E、HDR600、DP、HDMI、1920*1080P、27"、T&amp;#220;V、G-Sync、FreeSync、Adaptive Sync、Dolby Vison、BT.2020、rec.709。<br>
</li></ul><strong>测试项目</strong><strong><strong>一、漏光</strong></strong>将显示器设置成全黑画面，确保相机没有加载任何色彩算法（PP）的情况下，使用 JPG 格式拍摄，ISO 钉死 100，光圈钉死 F4，相机距离屏幕 60cm～1m，焦段推到屏幕占据 80%以上的画幅，然后 1/8s、1/4s、1/2s 和 1s 各拍一张，一般人眼所能察觉的漏光情况，会在 1/4s～1/2s 之间。<img id="aimg_I7kJW" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="509" height="302" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTU2OTZlN2I0ODFmMmVhYTZlZjc3MzA0MDgyZDc2OThfNTVYMFV5YlZ2VUlZeGkyUmpzdXdqclAxT1Ewa3M5SFpfVG9rZW46RHdkRWJZSE9vb3pWaVR4RDYxZWNDSG5EbmljXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTU2OTZlN2I0ODFmMmVhYTZlZjc3MzA0MDgyZDc2OThfNTVYMFV5YlZ2VUlZeGkyUmpzdXdqclAxT1Ewa3M5SFpfVG9rZW46RHdkRWJZSE9vb3pWaVR4RDYxZWNDSG5EbmljXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><strong>二、可视角度</strong></strong>尽量选用色彩丰富，明亮的图片，通过上、下、左、右（拍摄视角与屏幕夹角的角度约为 30°），正面且水平五个不同角度拍摄屏幕，观察亮度衰减及色彩过渡的实际表现。 <img id="aimg_ch1l1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="512" height="328" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTY0MGVjN2I5YzRjNWYwODQyMmI1NjljYmZiNjJkMTFfVVBDWEpWNUJhSGlQZkhiQ2xYMFlEck5JMGczTmVjSHFfVG9rZW46Smd2RmJ0SnNNb0cySEt4TXZ0OWNrV1BKbmhoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTY0MGVjN2I5YzRjNWYwODQyMmI1NjljYmZiNjJkMTFfVVBDWEpWNUJhSGlQZkhiQ2xYMFlEck5JMGczTmVjSHFfVG9rZW46Smd2RmJ0SnNNb0cySEt4TXZ0OWNrV1BKbmhoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><strong>三、工程模式</strong></strong><strong><font color="#245bdb">① </font><font color="#245bdb">进入方法</font></strong><ul><li>单独摇杆OSD 菜单：显示器通电状态下，将摇杆依次向上、下、左、右（四个方向依次尝试）按住同时断开显示器电源，再接上电源等屏幕点亮后松开摇杆，最后按一下摇杆即可。</li><li>单独按键OSD 菜单：显示器通电状态下，按住 Menu 键或确认键同时断开显示器电源，再接上电源等屏幕点亮后松开按键，最后按一下Menu 或确定键。三、菜单+摇杆OSD 菜单：显示器通电状态下，以上方法不行的情况下，将摇杆单独依次向四个方向按住，并同时按住 Menu 或确认键，再断开显示器电源，然后接上电源等屏幕点亮后松开按键，最后按一次摇杆、Menu 键、确认键（依次尝试）。<br>
</li></ul><strong><font color="#245bdb">② </font><font color="#245bdb">面板型号</font></strong>具体型号在工程模式中一般是以 Panel 或者 ID 后面的英文及数字的组合呈现，当下主流的面板厂商如下。<img id="aimg_L833k" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="240" height="328" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTIyN2JiNDgwY2QwYjU2YjJiZTA4MDllNWFhZTZjNjdfSmNOWlJydGdaRUxSMUEzUDVmSEx2cXVuYWNsNzJoTUxfVG9rZW46S1JXWmJrcTlKb210em94RGRQdmM1RlhMbnpnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTIyN2JiNDgwY2QwYjU2YjJiZTA4MDllNWFhZTZjNjdfSmNOWlJydGdaRUxSMUEzUDVmSEx2cXVuYWNsNzJoTUxfVG9rZW46S1JXWmJrcTlKb210em94RGRQdmM1RlhMbnpnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><img id="aimg_pX2fU" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="239" height="330" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWJiODI5ZDkzZDZhZGVlOTNjNmM3NzM3N2Q1YzNhNTZfaTVNeTNPbjQ1bnJ0TXdFeW45M0NuWjAwdDVDU3dLbERfVG9rZW46U0NPSGJtc0I2b0Q3UEt4dE80UGNpZnQybmJmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWJiODI5ZDkzZDZhZGVlOTNjNmM3NzM3N2Q1YzNhNTZfaTVNeTNPbjQ1bnJ0TXdFeW45M0NuWjAwdDVDU3dLbERfVG9rZW46U0NPSGJtc0I2b0Q3UEt4dE80UGNpZnQybmJmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><br>
<br>
<ul><li>第一梯队：三星（SAMSUNG）、LG（LG Display）、<font color="#d83931">JDI（Japan Display Inc）已退市</font>、夏普（SHARP）、华星光电（CSOT）SHVA/OLED 系列、友达（AUO）Ultra Fast IPS</li><li>第二梯队：京东方（BOE）、华星光电（CSOT）、友达（AUO）、群创（Innolux）</li><li>第三梯队：天马微电子（TIANMA）、中电熊猫（PANDA）、中华映管（CPT）、龙腾光电（IVO）、惠科（HKC）<br>
</li></ul><strong><font color="#245bdb">③ </font><font color="#245bdb">驱动芯片</font></strong><ul><li>显示器主流的方案有 RTD（瑞昱）、MTK（联发科）两种。</li><li>驱动 IC 目前分为列于X 轴的源极驱动 IC（Source Driver IC）与列于 Y 轴的闸极驱动IC（Gate Driver IC）。源极驱动 IC 是安排资料的输入，特性为高频并具备显 像功能，主要供应商有 Sharp（夏普）、NEC（恩益禧）及 Seiko Epson（爱普生）等。</li><li>闸极驱动 IC 是决定液晶分子的扭转与快慢，主要供应商有TI（德州仪器）。当下主流的驱动IC 厂商有 Novatek（联咏科技）、LX Semicon（乐尔幸）、Himax（奇景光电）、Raydium（瑞鼎科技）、Fiti（天鈺科技）、Torey（通锐微）、Chipone（集创北方）、ESWIN（奕斯伟）。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_dQkQf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="210" height="312" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDEzODg2YzgzM2JhMDkxYTdhYmJjNGMzODYzZTE0NmNfOXNPd2VKSVRZZjZsclF4NXVyZkFHSEN2TUZrdnJlWnJfVG9rZW46SDNveGJ5OGptbzVTbUh4Mkk5NmNRaVo4bjJkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDEzODg2YzgzM2JhMDkxYTdhYmJjNGMzODYzZTE0NmNfOXNPd2VKSVRZZjZsclF4NXVyZkFHSEN2TUZrdnJlWnJfVG9rZW46SDNveGJ5OGptbzVTbUh4Mkk5NmNRaVo4bjJkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><img id="aimg_y8MXy" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="225" height="314" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTJiMTA3MjRmNDNhMjJmMDk1NWZjZDYwNzVhNGE1ZTdfczMwUlptSVNzQUM3Z3pZSEpLbWx2NnpHZmlxcEJ6STdfVG9rZW46QUJrS2JIbWR2b2I0ZGV4VDNMRmNLQlRQbjMzXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTJiMTA3MjRmNDNhMjJmMDk1NWZjZDYwNzVhNGE1ZTdfczMwUlptSVNzQUM3Z3pZSEpLbWx2NnpHZmlxcEJ6STdfVG9rZW46QUJrS2JIbWR2b2I0ZGV4VDNMRmNLQlRQbjMzXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">④ </font><font color="#245bdb">面板查询</font></strong><ul><li>知道对应面板型号后可以在屏库中查看信息，被屏蔽的情况可以找厂商要一份屏规格书。</li><li>当亮度为 0cd/m2 可以判定为自组背光面板，反之为原厂背光模组，或者查看面板型号，标注有 OpenCell、OC、Cell 就是仅仅只有液晶而没有背光。还有一种特殊情况，OC 已经推出但是厂家或屏库都没有查询到资料，面板型号又完全一致但是亮度对不上，可以认为是面板厂商偷偷出了 OC，但是还没有资料，相关参数可以直接依据原厂模组的参数，背光相关信息除外。</li><li>还可以看尺寸、色深、刷新率、响应速度、像素布局等信息。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_k6aT3" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="673" height="380" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2ZlNWExN2JlODQ4Yjg3ZTViZDg0MGEzNTcxNTIxMTNfUDZnZmdWZzdzN2ZuU2JRQnZIbVRhRHRqZTVJYVczSElfVG9rZW46VXBVRmI3TUhyb2dRdVd4V3d2WWNXSEdvbnBlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2ZlNWExN2JlODQ4Yjg3ZTViZDg0MGEzNTcxNTIxMTNfUDZnZmdWZzdzN2ZuU2JRQnZIbVRhRHRqZTVJYVczSElfVG9rZW46VXBVRmI3TUhyb2dRdVd4V3d2WWNXSEdvbnBlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">⑤ 规格书</font></strong>可用于核实屏库上显示的信息。基础信息如图：从上到下依次为内尺寸、外尺寸、重量、分辨率、技术方案、分辨率、像素间距、像素布局、色深、显示模式、玻璃厚度、白点值、对比度、透光率、视角、偏光片。<img id="aimg_E2e82" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="549" height="508" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTBmNzE2YmI3NjhjMjU2MGM1YTZkZTU0NTBhYzM2ZDVfeTloaWR1Tm1HY3V5TlVlTGhEMlVGT3htVng0UEdZemlfVG9rZW46V3kxSmI1eXZCb1VyR0x4RXQxUGNhZ2N6bkNoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTBmNzE2YmI3NjhjMjU2MGM1YTZkZTU0NTBhYzM2ZDVfeTloaWR1Tm1HY3V5TlVlTGhEMlVGT3htVng0UEdZemlfVG9rZW46V3kxSmI1eXZCb1VyR0x4RXQxUGNhZ2N6bkNoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">⑥ 像素点</font></strong>像素点布局（像素点排列）下图为垂直条状排列。<img id="aimg_Z0Lfh" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="488" height="312" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODlmYjc2OWE3MTViZDliZjA1MzFkMTg1OTcyZGVkZmFfOVVIT2hLV1R4STVIdjNnQW15MGEwUDN4MVVReFBvVWlfVG9rZW46SnZRYmJQTVJ1b2lmdWd4bm5IVmNzNVI0bjdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODlmYjc2OWE3MTViZDliZjA1MzFkMTg1OTcyZGVkZmFfOVVIT2hLV1R4STVIdjNnQW15MGEwUDN4MVVReFBvVWlfVG9rZW46SnZRYmJQTVJ1b2lmdWd4bm5IVmNzNVI0bjdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>RGB 标准垂直条状排列：</strong>将一个像素单元分成三等分，红绿蓝三原色的占比是一致的，但是对于颜色排列顺序没有固定要求。</li><li><strong>RGB 鱼鳞状排列：</strong>相对于标准RGB 排列不同的是，将像素点按一定角度固定排列。</li><li><strong>RGBW 排列：</strong>相对于标准 RGB 排列增加了一个 W（white）白色子像素点，在显示相同亮度的画面时功耗更低，相同功耗的情况下亮度大幅提高。</li><li><strong>Date 排列：</strong>三色子像素数量是相同的，像素点各减少了三分之一，六个子像素共用周围的一个像素。</li><li><strong>BOE 排列：</strong>绿色子像素被分割成两个小部分，子像素数量是相同，像素点各减少了三分之一，六个子像素共用周围的一个像素。</li><li><strong>Pentile 排列：</strong>单个像素从 RGB 变成了 RGGB，减少了蓝色像素和红色像素的数量，绿色像素数量不变且相邻的两个像素共享一个绿色像素。</li><li><strong>钻石排列：</strong>由于四个子像素呈菱形排列，像素数量一致但子像素变少。</li><li><strong>TCL 华星 Pearl 排列：</strong>每个像素由 R-G 和 B-G 组合而成，G 子像素为真实像素，R 与 B 子像素相比 Real RGB 减少 1/2。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_BOkLx" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="604" height="432" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWY1Y2UxMWM3ZDMzYTM2OGNmMTYyYWE3MDdmZWZkMTBfaXAybnJxa2p0UzZadUlOU1pmUTRhYlRta3RqcjVqQTBfVG9rZW46RWp3bmJHNkp3b0NLU1N4YWtBWmNraWtlbmRkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWY1Y2UxMWM3ZDMzYTM2OGNmMTYyYWE3MDdmZWZkMTBfaXAybnJxa2p0UzZadUlOU1pmUTRhYlRta3RqcjVqQTBfVG9rZW46RWp3bmJHNkp3b0NLU1N4YWtBWmNraWtlbmRkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图最左一列从上到下依次是对比度、透射率、色准、响应时间、可视角度。<strong><strong>四、色深兼容性</strong></strong><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>色深指在位图或视频帧缓冲区中用于表示单个像素的颜色的比特数，或者是用于单个像素的每个颜色分量的比特数，用来描述色彩丰富程度的参数，色深越高能显示的色彩数量就越多，因此颜色之间可以非常平滑地过渡<br>
<ul><li><strong>8Bit：</strong>表示红、绿、蓝各自可被平均分成 2^8=256 份；256*256*256=1670 万种色彩数目。</li><li><strong>10Bit：</strong>表示红、绿、蓝各自可被平均分成 2^10=1024 份；1024*1024*1024=1073741824（10 亿）种色彩数目。</li><li><strong>8Bit 抖 10Bit（8bit+FRC）：</strong>通过帧率控制（Frame Rate Control），易周期性时间抖动的形式，在每一个新的帧中在不同的色阶之间循环，以模拟一个中间色阶。</li><li><strong>HDR 8Bit：</strong>需要显卡支持，推荐使用 AMD 显卡，部分显示器的 HDIM/USB-C 只可做到 6Bit。</li><li><strong>HDR 10Bit</strong>：只有支持 HDR 应用才可开启。<br>
</li></ul><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>PC 主机：</strong>将刷新率、色深都设置为最大。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_vkedH" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="348" height="424" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDI2ODQzZGI0NWJjMTJjYjc1OTRjZTQ2MDBjMWVjMTlfOFptRkFLVjI0a1RRUjdkYVdZaFVhSVlxbnFwQXZYeDFfVG9rZW46TThMcGJTVmwwb3IyQkR4RkJsU2NkSHhJbnlmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDI2ODQzZGI0NWJjMTJjYjc1OTRjZTQ2MDBjMWVjMTlfOFptRkFLVjI0a1RRUjdkYVdZaFVhSVlxbnFwQXZYeDFfVG9rZW46TThMcGJTVmwwb3IyQkR4RkJsU2NkSHhJbnlmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>DP 口：</strong>可用于判断是否为满血口或残血口以及 DSC 技术。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_JmMpn" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="375" height="476" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Y2QwY2Y0YjI0NTMyYzMyMzg2YzMzMmY1ZGRiYjY2MjVfaXR1R2R0a0VMVGRmZGtGcUcxbzg5M29MMVdBb201bDVfVG9rZW46Skx3OWI1ZnZ6bzBNSmR4cWN3T2N4M1Nqbm9iXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Y2QwY2Y0YjI0NTMyYzMyMzg2YzMzMmY1ZGRiYjY2MjVfaXR1R2R0a0VMVGRmZGtGcUcxbzg5M29MMVdBb201bDVfVG9rZW46Skx3OWI1ZnZ6bzBNSmR4cWN3T2N4M1Nqbm9iXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>HDMI 口：</strong>可用于判断是否为满血口或残血口以及 DSC 技术。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_x514W" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="765" height="540" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MWNlMTgxOTE3YjhiN2E0YjU4NzBlYjlhNjY3NmY5NzRfSGVsRjBNVTlaYlhuSWtCbFc0ZkxkRzZjUk5IalBIaTVfVG9rZW46WmEyVWJpNWhybzcxNlB4QjNwUmNIQmR3bkRlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MWNlMTgxOTE3YjhiN2E0YjU4NzBlYjlhNjY3NmY5NzRfSGVsRjBNVTlaYlhuSWtCbFc0ZkxkRzZjUk5IalBIaTVfVG9rZW46WmEyVWJpNWhybzcxNlB4QjNwUmNIQmR3bkRlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">附表：各版本 DP 口、HDMI 口在不同分辨下支持的最大刷新率。<ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>XBOX：</strong>显示器需要开启 G-Sync、FreeSync、Adaptive Sync 功能，将主机和显示器使用HDMI 线链接并开启主机，记录如下数据。<br>
</li></ul><ul><li>设置-常规里查看，总共可开启几种分辨率以及对应的刷新率。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_VkSk5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="633" height="289" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGYzMTM0MTdkNDM4N2FlMGRhN2RhZjQxMDFiYTVlZjlfcWhLM01LVjdVUVZ0Rk9nazFFTVl6UTNCanFJb20yQlhfVG9rZW46SjVucmJzNjVhb3dHR2d4em1OSWNQbWQybmtjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGYzMTM0MTdkNDM4N2FlMGRhN2RhZjQxMDFiYTVlZjlfcWhLM01LVjdVUVZ0Rk9nazFFTVl6UTNCanFJb20yQlhfVG9rZW46SjVucmJzNjVhb3dHR2d4em1OSWNQbWQybmtjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>设置-常规-4K 电视详细里查看，各种模式的支持情况。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_yBJ3n" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="650" height="343" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2ViMjYzMGZiOGFlYzI4OTQ1Y2FlYjY1MjExZmY0MGRfSnBjUXpIaFFZaGZYeG83WVFmTDR3Tlo4ejNUZXpPVzJfVG9rZW46RG5HSmJnWkNSb0p5YnN4cGVNcmNQZFVNbjRMXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2ViMjYzMGZiOGFlYzI4OTQ1Y2FlYjY1MjExZmY0MGRfSnBjUXpIaFFZaGZYeG83WVFmTDR3Tlo4ejNUZXpPVzJfVG9rZW46RG5HSmJnWkNSb0p5YnN4cGVNcmNQZFVNbjRMXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>设置-常规-视频里查看，变量刷新率、色彩空间、HDR、Dolby Vison、Dolby Vison for Gaming 等。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_YFjMz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="645" height="315" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDhhYjgyYzdjN2MxNzI4NTdiN2JlZGIwOWI0NGRiYzRfREFGQnJhdkYya1dOWVVXWnJpVnU1UENGTEdxNmJJR1FfVG9rZW46VmxtcWJSMHA3bzBxUmJ4eGFNWWNvQjBlblpmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDhhYjgyYzdjN2MxNzI4NTdiN2JlZGIwOWI0NGRiYzRfREFGQnJhdkYya1dOWVVXWnJpVnU1UENGTEdxNmJJR1FfVG9rZW46VmxtcWJSMHA3bzBxUmJ4eGFNWWNvQjBlblpmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>PS5：</strong>显示器需要开启 G-Sync、FreeSync、Adaptive Sync 功能，将主机和显示器使用HDMI 线链接并开启主机，记录如下数据。<br>
</li></ul><ul><li>设置-屏幕和视频里先点击测试 1440P 输出，只需要查看对应 1440P 的显示器即可。带鱼屏的显示器需要留意画面比列问题。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_Z5Qu0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="636" height="377" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YmYyYTIwYWFlNjYzOTY4ZThiY2U2YmUwZWI5ZTMxN2VfTW10NzZCZ3VpUDQzYWhiT3d0UGU0emt1aW9WdGtnQmhfVG9rZW46SkFJdGJHWUl3b3VzMWV4bVlCNWNZbTZKbnQ0XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YmYyYTIwYWFlNjYzOTY4ZThiY2U2YmUwZWI5ZTMxN2VfTW10NzZCZ3VpUDQzYWhiT3d0UGU0emt1aW9WdGtnQmhfVG9rZW46SkFJdGJHWUl3b3VzMWV4bVlCNWNZbTZKbnQ0XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>等测试完毕后，查看已连接的 HDMI 设备信息，在不同分辨率下的支持情况，VRR、HDR 下的刷新率及色彩空间、SDR 下的刷新率。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_lfBpf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="650" height="325" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTNmMTg1OWI3ZmExMTBlNWViZDc0Yjg1ZGU2Y2NlZWFfZnM1bzByNkVsM1pkZ1dYa3QwRWhCMDJPazNUSElDMDVfVG9rZW46SE5ES2JmcmVZb0dEeFZ4dW94dGNXT2Uzbm5lXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTNmMTg1OWI3ZmExMTBlNWViZDc0Yjg1ZGU2Y2NlZWFfZnM1bzByNkVsM1pkZ1dYa3QwRWhCMDJPazNUSElDMDVfVG9rZW46SE5ES2JmcmVZb0dEeFZ4dW94dGNXT2Uzbm5lXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>查看当前视频影像输出信号，HDCP 版本、色彩空间、分辨率、刷新率。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_SAiSI" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="606" height="250" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmE3MjVlMjg5OTc3MmQwMjhlZjEwNWZmZjUwYzE5ZTNfdkdMWnNnR1QzbzhEMWl0OXFCa25Bbzd1bDI0b0VwWEdfVG9rZW46Vzc2ZmJVME5Mb1ZGN1N4RXZrcWNKMTFlblhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmE3MjVlMjg5OTc3MmQwMjhlZjEwNWZmZjUwYzE5ZTNfdkdMWnNnR1QzbzhEMWl0OXFCa25Bbzd1bDI0b0VwWEdfVG9rZW46Vzc2ZmJVME5Mb1ZGN1N4RXZrcWNKMTFlblhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>在屏幕和视频选项中查看并记录：VRR（可变刷新率）ALLM（自动低延迟模式）的支持情况。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_HJkdD" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="614" height="332" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjJmN2E3YzRjMDMzNTgxZTAwYzQyNjJmYjIxZmM3NDdfTkhrU2U2Wkd0SjBHcFVNZGgyRW1hWmk4VWl4VFBCT3JfVG9rZW46RkVNZWJrV1NKb1I2WGN4MFFmdmN2N0RibkhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjJmN2E3YzRjMDMzNTgxZTAwYzQyNjJmYjIxZmM3NDdfTkhrU2U2Wkd0SjBHcFVNZGgyRW1hWmk4VWl4VFBCT3JfVG9rZW46RkVNZWJrV1NKb1I2WGN4MFFmdmN2N0RibkhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>Type-C：</strong>主要看于MacBook设备的兼容性以及反向充电功能。<br>
</li></ul>连接 Macbook 设备，在显示器设置中，记录不同分辨率下的刷新率，查看是否支持 HiDPI 功能，HDMI/DP 接口接需要测试。<img id="aimg_hT38B" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="616" height="452" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjgxYTM4MmRiM2UyNjdhMWMwNTI2M2UyMmQ0NDBkMThfYTRqQXhRZnhkeUxIVERxTHVWcnd2RmdIYTNtcXZFbmxfVG9rZW46Q1FJcmJPZ2Zab05SQTl4NjIwU2N4anpObnNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjgxYTM4MmRiM2UyNjdhMWMwNTI2M2UyMmQ0NDBkMThfYTRqQXhRZnhkeUxIVERxTHVWcnd2RmdIYTNtcXZFbmxfVG9rZW46Q1FJcmJPZ2Zab05SQTl4NjIwU2N4anpObnNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>接口数量：</strong>查看配置是否阉割。<br>
</li></ul>拍摄接口数量，有注明接口版本号的一并记录，没的查询对应表格。<img id="aimg_G8oL0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="630" height="300" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODYxZTU0MGZkN2YzMGFiMDMyNGNlOTAzOWIyYzYwZjhfWm1jQzkwM2JIRnl5WTZPQVIyRkUwQVVXN0lkRWZrVWRfVG9rZW46SGZyVmIwMmJnb3Fza1l4c1Q5SGNiOG1KbnVoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODYxZTU0MGZkN2YzMGFiMDMyNGNlOTAzOWIyYzYwZjhfWm1jQzkwM2JIRnl5WTZPQVIyRkUwQVVXN0lkRWZrVWRfVG9rZW46SGZyVmIwMmJnb3Fza1l4c1Q5SGNiOG1KbnVoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><strong>五、屏幕均匀性</strong></strong><blockquote><strong>DisplayCAL软件+Spyder X设备</strong></blockquote><strong>I 屏幕亮度均匀性</strong><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong><strong>亮度均匀度：</strong>是指显示器在整个屏幕区域上显示亮度的一致性，良好的亮度均匀度可以确保图片和视频在屏幕上的不同部分都具有一致的亮度表现，从而提供更好的视觉体验，亮度均匀度过低可能导致显示器在不同区域的亮度差异较大，影响图像的整体效果和观感，在专业领域，这可能导致图像细节丢失或者误判，影响工作效果，在日常使用中，过低的亮度均匀度可能导致视觉不适，增加眼睛疲劳。<strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 DisplsyCAL 软件，确认好显示器和校色仪及设置里为&lt;当前&gt;。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_jnBB9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="636" height="351" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWM4OWMyOGQ0MGE5YmY3ODQ0ZDY0MzZhMjRiOGMxYzZfelI2eVdkeHRvVG5yTm5hSkdld2VUb0RwUjY0MWNkMEpfVG9rZW46Tmo3TWJXU3ZUbzZzeTB4NVA2RWNyR1ZyblJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWM4OWMyOGQ0MGE5YmY3ODQ0ZDY0MzZhMjRiOGMxYzZfelI2eVdkeHRvVG5yTm5hSkdld2VUb0RwUjY0MWNkMEpfVG9rZW46Tmo3TWJXU3ZUbzZzeTB4NVA2RWNyR1ZyblJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击工具-报告-测量显示设备均匀度。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_F2204" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="618" height="318" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OGI4MjNhYmM3OTJkM2FkYTA1M2EzYmRjZTFiNDI1NDJfREd3b2xvWHN4ZUNNUWF0bTVLWXlyaGV6eGZjdjZaVlpfVG9rZW46RDltVmJtZ2pmbzJYSHF4eWQ2bGNPNEFBbmtlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OGI4MjNhYmM3OTJkM2FkYTA1M2EzYmRjZTFiNDI1NDJfREd3b2xvWHN4ZUNNUWF0bTVLWXlyaGV6eGZjdjZaVlpfVG9rZW46RDltVmJtZ2pmbzJYSHF4eWQ2bGNPNEFBbmtlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>弹出色块布局对话框，色块布局必须选 5x5，点击确定。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_j4BZz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="642" height="332" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWM5NzBhY2Y1YzYwYTEyMWQ3Yjg5MjE3YjVjMTIzMzlfZWlaNjlYRlJBb3JmSVRxQzN3VkcyMzBWUWN5WjJJSHZfVG9rZW46U0JjemI4R0lFb1U5ZnV4T0Qwc2NTWkJXblpnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWM5NzBhY2Y1YzYwYTEyMWQ3Yjg5MjE3YjVjMTIzMzlfZWlaNjlYRlJBb3JmSVRxQzN3VkcyMzBWUWN5WjJJSHZfVG9rZW46U0JjemI4R0lFb1U5ZnV4T0Qwc2NTWkJXblpnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>软件若有提示需要校准，就将 Spyder X 盖好后点击确定按钮；完成校准后将设备至于每个格子的正中间并保持贴合，依次点击测试按钮。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_XSsjt" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="646" height="350" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2VhMTg4ODM1MmNmNjc3OGUxYjc2MmQ4ZTM1NWNkMTZfcVZqSHZ2UzlWZnlZSW1MMGRQeGVIQ0pacGtVSVZXNm9fVG9rZW46SE42RmJNb0RLb2xudDJ4NDB6T2N1RWtTbktmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2VhMTg4ODM1MmNmNjc3OGUxYjc2MmQ4ZTM1NWNkMTZfcVZqSHZ2UzlWZnlZSW1MMGRQeGVIQ0pacGtVSVZXNm9fVG9rZW46SE42RmJNb0RLb2xudDJ4NDB6T2N1RWtTbktmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>都完成后点击确定会生成的一份报告，如下图所示。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_xlpbb" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="647" height="311" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWJkNzI5ZGY0NTlmNjU0OTk4ODA2ZTRlMTdlZDM0ZDFfcTl2dEZkQkx6SnNQdDlBOFY0T3NOeGlGd25rM1hhUTdfVG9rZW46TU1YbGJiSjRBb1l3MkV4dElFa2NjODBhblBqXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWJkNzI5ZGY0NTlmNjU0OTk4ODA2ZTRlMTdlZDM0ZDFfcTl2dEZkQkx6SnNQdDlBOFY0T3NOeGlGd25rM1hhUTdfVG9rZW46TU1YbGJiSjRBb1l3MkV4dElFa2NjODBhblBqXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>对于报告的解读，分别查看每个格子在 25%、50%、75%、100%与标准值的差值百分比。 <ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>评价标准选择：</strong>以 ISO 14861:2015 为基准，不同亮度下的亮度标准值与每个窗口实际测量值进行比对。</li><li><strong>红色方格：</strong>当不同亮度下的差值百分比10%，显示为红色，代表均匀性较差。</li><li><strong>橙色方格：</strong>不同亮度下的差值百分比&lt; 10%&gt; 5%，显示为橙色，代表均匀性一般，</li><li><strong>绿色方格：</strong>不同亮度下的差值百分比&lt; 5%，显示为绿色，代表均匀性较好。<br>
</li></ul></li><li>另附：ISO 14861:2015 标准规定所涵盖的内容如下： <ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>色彩空间要求</strong>：色彩软校对系统必须支持至少一种广泛使用的色彩空间，如 sRGB、Adobe RGB 等。</li><li><strong>色彩校准要求</strong>：色彩软校对系统必须能够进行色彩校准，以确保其输出的色彩与实际输出设备的色彩一致。</li><li><strong>显示器要求：</strong>色彩软校对系统必须使用高质量的显示器，以确保其能够准确地显示图像的色彩和细节。</li><li><strong>软件要求：</strong>色彩软校对系统必须使用专业的色彩管理软件，以确保其能够提供准确和一致的色彩预览。</li><li><strong>测量仪器要求：</strong>色彩软校对系统必须使用可靠的测量仪器，以确保其能够准确地测量和校准色彩。</li><li><strong>文件格式要求：</strong>色彩软校对系统必须支持广泛使用的文件格式，如TIFF、JPEG、PDF 等。</li><li><strong>输出设备要求：</strong>色彩软校对系统必须支持广泛使用的输出设备，如打印机、数码相机等。</li><li><strong>用户界面要求：</strong>色彩软校对系统必须具有易于使用和理解的用户界面，以便用户能够轻松地进行色彩校准和预览。<br>
</li></ul><br>
</li></ul><strong>II 屏幕色彩均匀性</strong><strong>理论知识：</strong>色彩均匀度是指显示器在整个屏幕区域上显示颜色的一致性。良好的色彩均匀度可以确保在屏幕的各个部分都能获得准确的颜色表现，对于专业领域如图像处理、设计等尤为重要。色彩均匀度过低可能导致显示器在不同区域的颜色和亮度差异较大，影响图像的整体效果和观感，在专业领域，这可能导致颜色不准确，影响工作效果，在日常使用中，过低的色彩均匀度可能导致视觉不适。<img id="aimg_LhrAr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="670" height="322" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2NiZDVlMGVlZjM3YTdiNzMwOTEyMWU2Mzk5NDA2OTJfSUhVV3E1RmtoSkhkMURIcHM3b0VCdkJtdzNYamU1RklfVG9rZW46UFVVb2JVN1Qzb1Z0VlV4WVVTYmMwRHlzblBjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2NiZDVlMGVlZjM3YTdiNzMwOTEyMWU2Mzk5NDA2OTJfSUhVV3E1RmtoSkhkMURIcHM3b0VCdkJtdzNYamU1RklfVG9rZW46UFVVb2JVN1Qzb1Z0VlV4WVVTYmMwRHlzblBjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">注：上图以Average luminance &amp;△c*00 为基准，不同亮度下的色准标准值与每个窗口实际测量值进行比对，其他参照屏幕亮度均匀性部分。<strong><strong>六、画面变形</strong></strong><img id="aimg_XN993" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="909" height="511" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTM5ZDc1NzdlMTM5ZjA3ZGFhYTVhMzQ2MDIzZmM2ZGVfQ0E2cnVhRW15R0FuaWlMS01aVXpkeU8xMEhVZ1M3ejFfVG9rZW46S3hqTWJySmFnb2F1eVN4YXVwZmNLdFdObjhjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTM5ZDc1NzdlMTM5ZjA3ZGFhYTVhMzQ2MDIzZmM2ZGVfQ0E2cnVhRW15R0FuaWlMS01aVXpkeU8xMEhVZ1M3ejFfVG9rZW46S3hqTWJySmFnb2F1eVN4YXVwZmNLdFdObjhjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">注：通过播放一段专业的视频，观察横向线条是否完全水平，竖向线条是否完全垂直。<strong>七、动态补偿</strong><img id="aimg_zFyle" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="669" height="376" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODdhZTliNmMxYWY5MWFhOGFiOTFhM2I2YzQzMjg5YjZfWGN2eWcyRFhPRzQ4REJxUjQ5VldlOXcxaWRlVEtPY1BfVG9rZW46WjF2NGJ2cjRwbzA3TkJ4MTZRaGNiM0VpblNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODdhZTliNmMxYWY5MWFhOGFiOTFhM2I2YzQzMjg5YjZfWGN2eWcyRFhPRzQ4REJxUjQ5VldlOXcxaWRlVEtPY1BfVG9rZW46WjF2NGJ2cjRwbzA3TkJ4MTZRaGNiM0VpblNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">注：通过播放一段专业的视频，查看画面中间部分是否存在不连续、抖动等情况。<strong>八、输入延迟</strong><blockquote><strong>4K Lag Tester软件+4K Lag Tester设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong><strong>输入延迟：</strong>定义为当用户做出一个操作，到显示设备上的图像开始变化这个过程所需要的时间。如果输入延迟太高，用户会感觉自己的操作有迟滞感，鼠标指针变得飘忽或不跟手。实测数值即为总输入延迟，由两个部分组成，一是两帧图像之间的间隔，记为 T1 输入延迟，二是显示设备处理图像的时间，记为T2 输入延迟。不同刷新率对应的T1 输入延迟见下表：<img id="aimg_CZQIo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="638" height="264" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzZjYTNlNTc0N2Y5M2EwZTc1MmRlN2JkYmJmZmYyMTZfeXVXRGtLSlNOQXEyVzdMc3psZ1hTN2tyTGZNOGg1a1dfVG9rZW46S0M5amI1c1Vxb0VnRnV4cVZVWGM2anZqbjFkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzZjYTNlNTc0N2Y5M2EwZTc1MmRlN2JkYmJmZmYyMTZfeXVXRGtLSlNOQXEyVzdMc3psZ1hTN2tyTGZNOGg1a1dfVG9rZW46S0M5amI1c1Vxb0VnRnV4cVZVWGM2anZqbjFkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">120Hz 下T2 输入延迟理论最小值为 4.2ms，60Hz 下 T2 输入延迟理论最小值为 8.3ms，实测后的数值减去理论最小值后的值参照下表可做输入延迟的初步判断。<img id="aimg_hB19V" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="560" height="142" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDQ3NzgzZGFmODViOGFhZWRhZDFkYzE1MjUyMjY3YTNfTEFMSGhQdmplWks4bk5KQUxuMjc4TTNJdHVPUnZKbTBfVG9rZW46T3VIOGJwT2Fpb2tDMFp4OU51UmNlMGZQblFkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDQ3NzgzZGFmODViOGFhZWRhZDFkYzE1MjUyMjY3YTNfTEFMSGhQdmplWks4bk5KQUxuMjc4TTNJdHVPUnZKbTBfVG9rZW46T3VIOGJwT2Fpb2tDMFp4OU51UmNlMGZQblFkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong>I、准备两台显示器，将要测试的那台输入信号源切换到HDMI 口，打开 4K Lag Tester 软件并拖到另一台显示器，将设备连接至电脑。<img id="aimg_oF36s" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="744" height="279" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YmJlNzgyZDE3ZTk2YjdlZWI2M2JhMGFmMTZmOTMxYjFfMjEweVRWcmtPemlIZ1R4YU5FU09tVG0yUlFyQXdEdnRfVG9rZW46WERWcWJGS3dwb3pzRVp4bTh2QWNsbXYybnZnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YmJlNzgyZDE3ZTk2YjdlZWI2M2JhMGFmMTZmOTMxYjFfMjEweVRWcmtPemlIZ1R4YU5FU09tVG0yUlFyQXdEdnRfVG9rZW46WERWcWJGS3dwb3pzRVp4bTh2QWNsbXYybnZnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong>软件界面说明：</strong><ul><li>Current Device：测试设备型号，</li><li>Video Format：选择不同分辨率及刷新率，</li><li>Set Format：保持所选的分辨率及刷新率。<br>
</li></ul>II、确认测试设备及选择对于的分辨率，点击 Set Format 按钮，目前测试 1920*1080p120、k2560*1600p60、3840*2160p60 这三种分辨率及刷新率下的输入延迟。II、将设备探头完整贴合的放置于中间白色的线条内，设备左侧与屏幕边缘对其，记录下稳定后的数值。<img id="aimg_ODpc8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="634" height="348" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODhiNGVkOGI2YzgzZWE3OGViY2ZiZWY5YmY2MmJjMjdfbjJtbjRKSUgxR3JHcUhrcVppMkRqdVI3eHVGdEpMNXVfVG9rZW46Q1FqT2Jrd2NDb21peW94b013QmN1cGtRbjhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODhiNGVkOGI2YzgzZWE3OGViY2ZiZWY5YmY2MmJjMjdfbjJtbjRKSUgxR3JHcUhrcVppMkRqdVI3eHVGdEpMNXVfVG9rZW46Q1FqT2Jrd2NDb21peW94b013QmN1cGtRbjhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">IV、对数据的解读：LAG 后面为具体的 T2 输入延迟时间，FORMAT 为所选择的分辨率及刷新率，最后一行为设备厂商及软件版本号。<strong>九、调光方式</strong><blockquote><strong>示波器设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>调光指的是对屏幕亮度的调节，为了让用户在不同光线条件下正常观看屏幕上的内容，屏幕需要相应地改变亮度，屏幕的亮度需要和环境亮度相匹配才能有舒适的观感。按护眼程度排序依次为：DC 调光＞类 DC 调光＞高频 PWM 调光＞低频 PWM 调光。占空比是指在某个周期性信号内，高电平信号的持续时间与总周期信号的持续时间的比例。<ul><li><strong>DC 调光： </strong>全称为 Direct Current，也叫直流调光，工作原理是通过提高或降低发光功率来改变屏幕的亮度，在示波器上可以看到一条直线，不会改变波形占空比始终为 100%，光源全程处于开启状态不会出现频闪现象，利于保护眼睛。</li><li><strong>类 DC 调光：</strong>与 DC 调光类似，前者属于硬件层面控制，后者属于软件层面控制。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_IN22x" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="479" height="327" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzhlMjZmZGExYTI0OTRhNDRmNmQ3NmU3ZmY4N2M1OGJfc3duV3V3M3I2bFF5T0FpR1Q4ZGRxblBvVmh2R0l6Y1VfVG9rZW46SXhvcGJWNGtVbzJvRHF4SWJpMmNPODBHbjdkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzhlMjZmZGExYTI0OTRhNDRmNmQ3NmU3ZmY4N2M1OGJfc3duV3V3M3I2bFF5T0FpR1Q4ZGRxblBvVmh2R0l6Y1VfVG9rZW46SXhvcGJWNGtVbzJvRHF4SWJpMmNPODBHbjdkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为DC 调光频谱图<ul><li><strong>高频 PWM 调光：</strong>全称为 Pulse Width Modulation，也叫脉冲宽度调光，工作原理是通过改变屏幕的点亮、熄灭交替的频率来调节屏幕亮度，在示波器上可以看到调整亮度就会改变波形占空比，光源处于交替开启关闭状态会产生频闪现象伤眼，不利于保护眼睛。≥3125Hz 可称为高频PWM 调光。</li><li><strong>低频 PWM 调光：</strong>同高频 PWM 调光，不同的是频率<strong>≤</strong>2160Hz。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_qn7N1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="555" height="294" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZThiNzBmZGQxMGNkMmRhZGJlNTM0OGU3Zjg4NWU5ZTRfazdNa05PVGVjcmpBYU4wVWpvZEtMbmhhVU1FSTVzTERfVG9rZW46U3lxTWJmRlJEb3dZZEh4b2pSQWN5bjRTbnp1XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZThiNzBmZGQxMGNkMmRhZGJlNTM0OGU3Zjg4NWU5ZTRfazdNa05PVGVjcmpBYU4wVWpvZEtMbmhhVU1FSTVzTERfVG9rZW46U3lxTWJmRlJEb3dZZEh4b2pSQWN5bjRTbnp1XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为PWM 调光频谱图<strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>需要分别测试 SDR、HDR 模式，Local Dimming（背光）开和关都要测，将示波器和光电增益探头按如下图连接，并分别将示波器及光电增益探头接上电源。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_e6lu9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="628" height="409" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWExOTE1NDBiNzgzNzEzOTI4MjNhZGY5MTgwMWQ4OTRfTW1wU3NJUWhtaExUQmJiSk9MTXRSbWhxbVR1MDBHc1VfVG9rZW46QnNxSWIyUTZSb3Z2MnB4UTNwb2NiVlJQblpmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWExOTE1NDBiNzgzNzEzOTI4MjNhZGY5MTgwMWQ4OTRfTW1wU3NJUWhtaExUQmJiSk9MTXRSbWhxbVR1MDBHc1VfVG9rZW46QnNxSWIyUTZSb3Z2MnB4UTNwb2NiVlJQblpmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将显示器设置为纯白色界面，并将光电增益探头完全贴合置于屏幕上。</li><li>调整屏幕亮度，并观察示波器频谱的变化。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_E9fku" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="664" height="378" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzQ0MmZiNGU0YjY2MmNjZGYwYjUwNjdhOTg5ZTQ5NTVfU21iNDJYUHh3NzNNeVhsb0NSZG5YcVozZXkyTzVLWVJfVG9rZW46T1RFM2J3bE91b1puSWx4UXNpOWNRVEdRbjBnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzQ0MmZiNGU0YjY2MmNjZGYwYjUwNjdhOTg5ZTQ5NTVfU21iNDJYUHh3NzNNeVhsb0NSZG5YcVozZXkyTzVLWVJfVG9rZW46T1RFM2J3bE91b1puSWx4UXNpOWNRVEdRbjBnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong>十、响应时间</strong><blockquote><strong>DataProc软件+DataProc设备（响应时间/响应速度/OD/Over Drive） </strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>显示设备的图像从开始变化到变化完成，这个过程的时间就叫做响应时间，衡量的是图像变化快慢。OverDrive 技术简称 OD 通过加压让液晶分子运动加快，从而提高响应速度。响应速度越快高速运动物体的拖影越少。但是加压程度过大就会带来过冲问题，我们用过冲率或超量来衡量过程的程度，液晶分子过度运动导致的像素错乱问题就越严重，用户就会看到更多的鬼影。注意区分拖影和鬼影，鬼影来自过冲错误，在飞碟图中表现为蓝色的诡异的影子，拖影则来自响应时间，响应时间越长拖影越多， 在飞碟图中表现为透明的残影。<ul><li><strong>拖影：</strong>响应速度太慢或响应时间太长的话，用户会看到快速运动的物体存在拖影现象，低于 10%的超调量下响应时间越小越好。</li><li><strong>过冲鬼影：</strong>液晶分子过度运动导致的像素错乱问题就越严重，用户就会看到更多的鬼影，两者区别如下图。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_t6Lld" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="647" height="456" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWRmYmU0NjA0MWZkYTFhMTBkYzAyMGJhYzhkMzhjN2JfMFlGZ01Dc2FleDhMTFJMM0U0SHpaeTAzSThHTTBYVDRfVG9rZW46VzU1cWJoaVBxb0RCSEN4NlhnRGNIS05BbjJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWRmYmU0NjA0MWZkYTFhMTBkYzAyMGJhYzhkMzhjN2JfMFlGZ01Dc2FleDhMTFJMM0U0SHpaeTAzSThHTTBYVDRfVG9rZW46VzU1cWJoaVBxb0RCSEN4NlhnRGNIS05BbjJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>掉帧/跳帧：</strong>掉帧指的是显示画面运行过程中突发的帧数降低，反复减少；跳帧指的是帧数在低谷与峰值之间来回波动，掉帧反复出现就是跳帧。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_UHpLF" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="709" height="198" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2QzMGNmZWE3YzJiODJkMGQ5Y2VhYTI0Mzg3MDEyODFfTXEzdkVqQUVhcG1hTjh2bzRiaUhEZjAzRWNWVktwQ0lfVG9rZW46S1FpN2JiY0F2bzZiNWF4UHFHVWNBbUxqbm1nXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2QzMGNmZWE3YzJiODJkMGQ5Y2VhYTI0Mzg3MDEyODFfTXEzdkVqQUVhcG1hTjh2bzRiaUhEZjAzRWNWVktwQ0lfVG9rZW46S1FpN2JiY0F2bzZiNWF4UHFHVWNBbUxqbm1nXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图白色格子为连续状态，即不存在跳帧现象。<img id="aimg_BCTQL" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="707" height="197" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODllYzEwMTBmNTQwZTFiMWM2YzZiZTgwYjYxYjdhNjhfVkl4OUNqRTczYXk0Ykx1TEhwZEsxM0hFcVFUQkpvRURfVG9rZW46WDl5VGJQaGRGb3ZOT0R4cXFsNWNjbDhFbndmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODllYzEwMTBmNTQwZTFiMWM2YzZiZTgwYjYxYjdhNjhfVkl4OUNqRTczYXk0Ykx1TEhwZEsxM0hFcVFUQkpvRURfVG9rZW46WDl5VGJQaGRGb3ZOT0R4cXFsNWNjbDhFbndmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图白色格子为非连续状态，即存在跳帧现象。<ul><li><strong>画面撕裂</strong>：指显示器将两帧或更多帧图像同时显示在同一画面上的现象，例如显示画面上半部分第一帧还没逐行扫描完，第二帧在后缓存里显示器还没有读取到数据，而显卡开始往前缓存里写第三帧，那么显示器的下边就会显示第三帧的画面。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_qfT2f" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="698" height="431" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzcxOGVkNWU3MmU3YWQ3ZTVkZDg5M2UxMzJmMjc0NGVfcGpXNGY2MmVaMlpoRmFSa3J4U2xuU1Q3VnBmY0dvdnlfVG9rZW46WG9EeGJxbHFob2hsNWp4TkFJRmNSTmNQblhmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzcxOGVkNWU3MmU3YWQ3ZTVkZDg5M2UxMzJmMjc0NGVfcGpXNGY2MmVaMlpoRmFSa3J4U2xuU1Q3VnBmY0dvdnlfVG9rZW46WG9EeGJxbHFob2hsNWp4TkFJRmNSTmNQblhmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong>使用跟屏幕刷新率相同的快门拍摄，120Hz=1/120s、165Hz=1/165s，如果没有对应档位的快门就是用慢一档的快门，如 144Hz=1/120s 或 1/125s。若拍摄的照片只有 2 个 UFO 那 GTG 响应时间满足刷新率要求，如果是 3 个 UFO 那说明 GTG 响应时间不满足改刷新率。<font color="#2ea121">I 响应时间测试</font><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将设备按下图方式连接，黑色的电源和蓝色的数据处理设备需要间隔较远的距离避免干扰，蓝色的加密狗需要插在 USB Hub 上，设备连接正常时会闪烁蓝灯。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_P02gz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="619" height="516" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWI1YjY2YjIxZmMxY2JkNGU5YzY3ZTc4N2NhZTYzZTdfbmlNOEtrWkRuRFlMbE5Sc1lUdFgxaXRpbjJodWYyb3lfVG9rZW46SmtrYWJGV25zb0ppRmJ4S1F3SGNEWWFCbmZmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWI1YjY2YjIxZmMxY2JkNGU5YzY3ZTc4N2NhZTYzZTdfbmlNOEtrWkRuRFlMbE5Sc1lUdFgxaXRpbjJodWYyb3lfVG9rZW46SmtrYWJGV25zb0ppRmJ4S1F3SGNEWWFCbmZmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 DataProc 软件，先设置数据保存路径，然后点击窗口预览，将设备对准预览窗口的中心位置，点击窗口锁定，将黑色探头的开光开启，单步测试修改为预设灰阶，确认没问题后点击开始采集。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_eNR4H" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="713" height="277" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDVkZWZjN2M5MmMzMTgwNjFmZDAwZmI2ODQxODRmZjFfRHV2ejEyOVBldDNVcGZHdjdJVXBVVlI2eWxWU0VZU3JfVG9rZW46UmRNdGJRUVRXb3UyaW14T2VKTGNNYWxlbk9mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDVkZWZjN2M5MmMzMTgwNjFmZDAwZmI2ODQxODRmZjFfRHV2ejEyOVBldDNVcGZHdjdJVXBVVlI2eWxWU0VZU3JfVG9rZW46UmRNdGJRUVRXb3UyaW14T2VKTGNNYWxlbk9mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>设备测试过程，探头红色指示灯常亮，右上角可以看到波形，未出现波形或波形比较奇怪，需要检测以上步骤是否操作正确。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_m0c6u" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="647" height="368" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDMzNDgyNTY2ZmZjM2IyNDEyZDhjNmVjNGFlMzQxNzlfVmRtUHUzclNzeGhzaURTRW5BTWtmZXAwQ2xTRlhXYUhfVG9rZW46QkZ6TGJwUkdvbzdyUmF4MjJNb2MzSlNvbmJqXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDMzNDgyNTY2ZmZjM2IyNDEyZDhjNmVjNGFlMzQxNzlfVmRtUHUzclNzeGhzaURTRW5BTWtmZXAwQ2xTRlhXYUhfVG9rZW46QkZ6TGJwUkdvbzdyUmF4MjJNb2MzSlNvbmJqXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>等测试结束后点击参数查看，等待数据生成再点导出，从下图可以看出 Max(最大值)、Min(最小值)、Mean(平均值)，截图保存取名为响应时间 1。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_SYI8b" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="723" height="406" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OWUxMGFhNmQ4MDRmMjkzNjgxYTk5YWExOGU0ZGIyYmNfcXc2VFZJS0JNaXVVR1pYeGJQV0htNHpkS1B3QVdPWW1fVG9rZW46TE1kS2JtMXF2b3ZOMGl4Tjh3WmMwdkJqbkxmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OWUxMGFhNmQ4MDRmMjkzNjgxYTk5YWExOGU0ZGIyYmNfcXc2VFZJS0JNaXVVR1pYeGJQV0htNHpkS1B3QVdPWW1fVG9rZW46TE1kS2JtMXF2b3ZOMGl4Tjh3WmMwdkJqbkxmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击 3D 视图，截图保存取名为响应时间 2。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_fEIZk" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="558" height="492" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OWVjOWY2NWRlYjU4ZDJjYzU5NGMxMGY0YzQyNzI4MWNfMDdacFg0ZmNiU3pHTml1QWNzbDk1M1lKUU10T3I2ZzRfVG9rZW46U0lhMWJKTkNtb2RYa0x4OUVVT2NzdGtMbjJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OWVjOWY2NWRlYjU4ZDJjYzU5NGMxMGY0YzQyNzI4MWNfMDdacFg0ZmNiU3pHTml1QWNzbDk1M1lKUU10T3I2ZzRfVG9rZW46U0lhMWJKTkNtb2RYa0x4OUVVT2NzdGtMbjJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将响应时间修改为超调量（过冲率），截图保存取名为超调量 1。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_msZSb" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="713" height="401" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTY3ZjM5YWU4NWJjNmMyYmQyYmUyNWUzZmIxNjhkMmRfQlBCRnNKdmdtV0x6QU00OWp0OG1Fa2Nhb2NzdHFCWFFfVG9rZW46V0Nac2JpRW9kb1plV1J4aHhiQmNFU0xzbmNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTY3ZjM5YWU4NWJjNmMyYmQyYmUyNWUzZmIxNjhkMmRfQlBCRnNKdmdtV0x6QU00OWp0OG1Fa2Nhb2NzdHFCWFFfVG9rZW46V0Nac2JpRW9kb1plV1J4aHhiQmNFU0xzbmNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击 3D 视图，生成超调量的 3D 视图，截图保存取名为超调量 2。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_FcX8L" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="554" height="501" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NGIyYjdmNjZlZTM5YjEzZjQ1MDYxZGI2YzVhOTBmZTBfSEVEakMxamN3ZFZCVkJNb2U1VUx1Q2xuT0ljRk9MbnNfVG9rZW46QmlIbmJOZVhCb3dIak14Q05qYmNHOG1XblFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NGIyYjdmNjZlZTM5YjEzZjQ1MDYxZGI2YzVhOTBmZTBfSEVEakMxamN3ZFZCVkJNb2U1VUx1Q2xuT0ljRk9MbnNfVG9rZW46QmlIbmJOZVhCb3dIak14Q05qYmNHOG1XblFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>对于数据的解读：首先观察不同 OD 档位下的超调量，如果超调量超过 10%画面必然出现鬼影现象，为不可用状态，由此可得在所有未超过 10%超调量的同档位下的响应时间的平均值越小越好。<br>
</li></ul><font color="#2ea121">II 鬼影测试</font>打开 <font color="#245bdb"><u>www.testufo.com</u></font>网站，选择 Ghosting/ Pursuit Camera 这一项，Backgroudn Color(背景颜色)、UFO separation(飞碟间距)、Speed(速度)、Graphics(图像)、Pursuit Camera Sync Tarck(相机同步轨迹) 这五个参数保持默认即可。<ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击绿色箭头，将窗口最大化。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_U42Ku" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="681" height="153" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWUyNjBhMDg4ZjMyNDk5NjBkZmZlOGViMjAyMTYwZDFfY2VLQ1hBR2NUazR0MlpPQjZuQjFwU3VVZkE4RnBWelRfVG9rZW46SDhIMGIyY1NIbzlTU0p4ZE4ybGNPZzNHbm9nXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWUyNjBhMDg4ZjMyNDk5NjBkZmZlOGViMjAyMTYwZDFfY2VLQ1hBR2NUazR0MlpPQjZuQjFwU3VVZkE4RnBWelRfVG9rZW46SDhIMGIyY1NIbzlTU0p4ZE4ybGNPZzNHbm9nXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将相机装在导轨且置于显示器前面屏幕的最左侧，镜头与屏幕保持垂直角度且处于中心点位置。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_WxLfE" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="516" height="214" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YzE5ZGM5NDNiOWU4MzM2NmFjMjYwMGY1ZDU1NzBmNDNfdmQxTEpnSWxEWEszcVZpN3BSMndzVFBGMWxLaDl5VVFfVG9rZW46WXlMcmJOU0V5b0J1WER4a3FabGNUUERNbm5iXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YzE5ZGM5NDNiOWU4MzM2NmFjMjYwMGY1ZDU1NzBmNDNfdmQxTEpnSWxEWEszcVZpN3BSMndzVFBGMWxLaDl5VVFfVG9rZW46WXlMcmJOU0V5b0J1WER4a3FabGNUUERNbm5iXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将相机曝光设置为显示器刷新时间的 4 倍。对于 120Hz 刷新率的屏幕使用 1/30 秒相机曝光。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_PNhg5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="679" height="342" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Njg4NTZhNjk4YTNhYTJkNjk2MWUyZjRiMThkNDkwNjNfRk1JQlRpb0tjZTlNN01EcWRPRHFkY2VUT1o5TTVaaHdfVG9rZW46WE5mYmJ2VmE2bzVrMHJ4ZGNsemNUMlRGbmlkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Njg4NTZhNjk4YTNhYTJkNjk2MWUyZjRiMThkNDkwNjNfRk1JQlRpb0tjZTlNN01EcWRPRHFkY2VUT1o5TTVaaHdfVG9rZW46WE5mYmJ2VmE2bzVrMHJ4ZGNsemNUMlRGbmlkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>拍摄出的图片需要确保轨道内的竖线为垂直的，才视为有效。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_Qrr6k" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="778" height="223" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGM4ZjliODg5MTU0YTU5YTA5YjBmMjNlZWVlMjE4YWFfYVNMM2N5OUpucFpHWnE4RHFGbmxaeXloWEZOMUZNMHVfVG9rZW46TVp2YWJBQXNkbzFXOTl4ZWFMZmNVZlRFbnE1XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGM4ZjliODg5MTU0YTU5YTA5YjBmMjNlZWVlMjE4YWFfYVNMM2N5OUpucFpHWnE4RHFGbmxaeXloWEZOMUZNMHVfVG9rZW46TVp2YWJBQXNkbzFXOTl4ZWFMZmNVZlRFbnE1XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><font color="#2ea121">III 跳帧测试</font><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 <font color="#245bdb"><u>www.testufo.com</u></font>网站，选择 Frame Skipping-For Display Overdocking 这一项，Horizontal Count(横向格子)和 Vertical Count(竖向格子)数量保持默认即可。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_NV04t" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="680" height="176" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTY1ZmUyMDI0OWViYjNhZGRmOTQ1MGUyNDRkMzdmZjhfRXY2UUwxaFB4ZTZ3WUdvYlc3eU9SN3dENEhWNmc3NzZfVG9rZW46RmZrbmJtY0hqb2ZZcDJ4TWZSWWNRWDdYbmFoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTY1ZmUyMDI0OWViYjNhZGRmOTQ1MGUyNDRkMzdmZjhfRXY2UUwxaFB4ZTZ3WUdvYlc3eU9SN3dENEhWNmc3NzZfVG9rZW46RmZrbmJtY0hqb2ZZcDJ4TWZSWWNRWDdYbmFoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击绿色箭头，将窗口最大化。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_hcc9j" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="624" height="283" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTc4NTE5NmRlYmI1NDZhZWY0ZjFhM2U4NjdiZWM1MmRfMXV5VXEwSkxrWFVaY3V3bVNKOVFFYzJnbXFlRkNZck9fVG9rZW46SzcwR2IybXFtb1E4UVp4emZuRGN4b1BUbmxaXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTc4NTE5NmRlYmI1NDZhZWY0ZjFhM2U4NjdiZWM1MmRfMXV5VXEwSkxrWFVaY3V3bVNKOVFFYzJnbXFlRkNZck9fVG9rZW46SzcwR2IybXFtb1E4UVp4emZuRGN4b1BUbmxaXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>相机设置 1/10 秒，注意曝光时间必须短于白色亮块扫完一次屏幕（所有黑块）的时间，不能太差，拍摄该屏幕的照片，查看方格子的连续状态，照片不应包含任何弹出消息。<br>
</li></ul><font color="#2ea121">IV 跳帧测试</font><strong>画面撕裂测试：</strong>将显示器开启对应的防撕裂功能(G-Sync、FreeSync、Adaptive Sync)，对比同画面中开启关闭后的显示效果即可。<strong>十一、色域</strong><blockquote><strong>DisplayCAL软件+Spyder X设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>色域也叫做色彩空间，是一种对颜色进行编码的方法，也指一种技术能够产生颜色的总和，用来描述色彩覆盖范围，CIE 国际照明协会制定出 CIE-xy 色度图用来描述色域，显示设备能够呈现出的色域范围用红、绿、蓝三点连线组成的三角区域来表示，三角形的面积越大表示色域范围越大，目前主流色域标准有 sRGB、NTSC、Adobe RGB、P3、PAL、Rec.2020( BT.2020)等六种。<ul><li>sRGB：可覆盖 35% 的可视色，由微软和惠普共同开发，基于独立的色彩坐标不受设备影响显示统一的色彩体系；</li><li> NTSC：是一套电视传输协议，由美国国家电视标准委员会推出；</li><li> Adobe RGB：色彩范围更广包含 sRGB 和 CMYK 两种，相比 sRGB 在青绿色色系有所提升，包含 50%的 LAB 色彩空间中的可视色彩；</li><li> P3：应用于数字影院包含 DCI-P3 和 Display P3 两种，DCI-P3 相比 sRGB 覆盖更多的红色和绿色，可以更准确的还原颜色，在 HDR 技术的加持下能包容更大范围的亮度，呈现更多的色彩数量；Display P3 由 Apple 基于 DCI-P3 修白点和伽马值，相比 sRGB 除开蓝色其他提升显著。</li><li>PAL：对相位失真不敏感、图像彩色误差小；</li><li> Rec.2020( BT.2020)：可覆盖 75.8% 的可视色，涵盖分辨率、帧率、位深和色域等参数。<br>
</li></ul>色域覆盖指得是显示设备色域和 sRGB 色域的重合率，色域容积指得是显示设备色域体积和 sRGB 色域体积的绝对比值，比值越大会导致由于色彩溢出造成颜色偏差及过饱和问题。<strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 DisplayCAL 软件，点击选项-恢复默认值。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_wXZzt" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="777" height="264" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjI4OGI3MGVhNWU2ZDUzNGQ5YzM1MWJiZDZjZWVjYjRfSlZtOWIyc2ZpUTVPNkJmVE9DeGRCOW1UU012WmtSSjZfVG9rZW46T0thQWJTVmQ0b050bXJ4SWhNcGM4M3lTbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjI4OGI3MGVhNWU2ZDUzNGQ5YzM1MWJiZDZjZWVjYjRfSlZtOWIyc2ZpUTVPNkJmVE9DeGRCOW1UU012WmtSSjZfVG9rZW46T0thQWJTVmQ0b050bXJ4SWhNcGM4M3lTbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>确认设置为&lt;当前&gt;，在显示器&amp;校色仪选选项卡下确认显示器及校色仪无误的情况下，切换到校准选项卡。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_rdO0w" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="680" height="620" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YjkzNWJlN2ZjYTJkYTA5NjRiZGYzY2FlNzBkNzJlNzBfbUtSbERwell0dFp1UVVGbWo5SWt6QkVYbzB5ZHBkVmhfVG9rZW46UmtQOGI0enNRb0FKa2d4VllwaGNCVDBxbnNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YjkzNWJlN2ZjYTJkYTA5NjRiZGYzY2FlNzBkNzJlNzBfbUtSbERwell0dFp1UVVGbWo5SWt6QkVYbzB5ZHBkVmhfVG9rZW46UmtQOGI0enNRb0FKa2d4VllwaGNCVDBxbnNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>如果校色仪中没有显示设备，检查线材是否插好或更换 USB 接口，确认无误的情况可重新安装驱动。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_O7xa7" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="689" height="299" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDcxODZlMzk1YTE0NWZjZTg1NmFmYzhmMWVkODY3ZDdfSlo5WUFVVm9XMVZMRHY2UG51M29mVGZOWHpTYzRkc1NfVG9rZW46RTM0MWI5S1prb2QwTTV4RFQ2RGNHajJDbk9OXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDcxODZlMzk1YTE0NWZjZTg1NmFmYzhmMWVkODY3ZDdfSlo5WUFVVm9XMVZMRHY2UG51M29mVGZOWHpTYzRkc1NfVG9rZW46RTM0MWI5S1prb2QwTTV4RFQ2RGNHajJDbk9OXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>可在设备管理器中查看驱动是否正常，如图为正常情况，显示为 SpyderX（Argyll）。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_kKKON" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="624" height="223" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjMwMzhiYmI0ODUzMzY2OGMzODlhOTlmZTkyZmViZTFfNkp3OXNObHBBdU04Mnhhb2FuNDNPbUxLZVdrRW01ZUJfVG9rZW46UEVkOWJDZmtLb0dTazV4WkdtZmM1c0U2bkdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjMwMzhiYmI0ODUzMzY2OGMzODlhOTlmZTkyZmViZTFfNkp3OXNObHBBdU04Mnhhb2FuNDNPbUxLZVdrRW01ZUJfVG9rZW46UEVkOWJDZmtLb0dTazV4WkdtZmM1c0U2bkdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>校准参数按下图设置，确认无误点击校准&amp;配置文件。白点-色温：6500K、白电平-亮度-自定义：180nit、色调曲线：Gamma2.2、伽马值：2.2。<br>
</li></ul>测试实际亮度、对比度、色域时候的参数：取消勾选交互式调整、其他均选择已测量，在点击校准配置文件，此时不要勾选在配置文件中…直接点击继续， 这样可以做出一份完全没有任何校准效果的 icc 文件。<img id="aimg_t6bP6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="669" height="713" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTFmMzE2M2MxMDdkODEwZTg2YjcwMDdhNmQxN2RlNGZfTXlZVGRwaXl3V0M1U3cyWlpSQzRQelIyVktKSkJJTDBfVG9rZW46WXJ1S2JCcnBlb0ZaeE94TWlMUGNYSzBGbjdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTFmMzE2M2MxMDdkODEwZTg2YjcwMDdhNmQxN2RlNGZfTXlZVGRwaXl3V0M1U3cyWlpSQzRQelIyVktKSkJJTDBfVG9rZW46WXJ1S2JCcnBlb0ZaeE94TWlMUGNYSzBGbjdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击开始测量。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_ritIx" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="309" height="317" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODI1NzJhYTI5ZDE5NjRlYjJkYjIxZDFiMWY2NjFiNzNfdW10Z3BPeWFpQ2Fwc1NqSW1hY0YwNG9vVElNYVFtY1JfVG9rZW46T1NsSGJaMEYxb2R2QmR4OHJJWWNjV2QxblFkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODI1NzJhYTI5ZDE5NjRlYjJkYjIxZDFiMWY2NjFiNzNfdW10Z3BPeWFpQ2Fwc1NqSW1hY0YwNG9vVElNYVFtY1JfVG9rZW46T1NsSGJaMEYxb2R2QmR4OHJJWWNjV2QxblFkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>按提示将设备盖好，点击确定，进行校色。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_IANsf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="525" height="155" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Njk4Y2I1NTg2ZjBiY2M3ODUyNWQwNzJiMjQ5YmQ2YjdfZnZidTFBYkkwNTdPUG5hS0RVYWNsUjBzUFRpQ214blRfVG9rZW46WndONWIwakRNb05NelR4eUI5SWNUc3VVbkVkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Njk4Y2I1NTg2ZjBiY2M3ODUyNWQwNzJiMjQ5YmQ2YjdfZnZidTFBYkkwNTdPUG5hS0RVYWNsUjBzUFRpQ214blRfVG9rZW46WndONWIwakRNb05NelR4eUI5SWNUc3VVbkVkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将显示器仰角适当调整一些，将设备放在测试窗口内，保持屏幕与设备的贴合。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_wYViA" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="437" height="403" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmIwMWE3NzcwODExYmNiYmY0NTlmYmU0NmE2ZTAwOTVfRjVrd3lVR2ZHN2JaWWlQc2M1b1ZYVkkwV2ZvTENRODNfVG9rZW46VzNLcmJNQldMb0VxVmN4aXZwRWNmOEZUblNiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmIwMWE3NzcwODExYmNiYmY0NTlmYmU0NmE2ZTAwOTVfRjVrd3lVR2ZHN2JaWWlQc2M1b1ZYVkkwV2ZvTENRODNfVG9rZW46VzNLcmJNQldMb0VxVmN4aXZwRWNmOEZUblNiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将显示器亮度调整最大，点击开始测试，测出数值后点击停止测量，截图保存取名为默认模式峰值亮度，并将亮度恢复默认后点继续校准。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_rGGp0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="558" height="519" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OThkNzUwNjQyMjc3ZjVhYTFlMGYzNWIxMDVmN2RjNGJfNWNjN2tRWjFiUUd2emhYbnNlRmFQZzRNVENPeXY1VTNfVG9rZW46WDZCQWJzUVNxb0ZXODl4NFZHUmM5R0NxbkpnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OThkNzUwNjQyMjc3ZjVhYTFlMGYzNWIxMDVmN2RjNGJfNWNjN2tRWjFiUUd2emhYbnNlRmFQZzRNVENPeXY1VTNfVG9rZW46WDZCQWJzUVNxb0ZXODl4NFZHUmM5R0NxbkpnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>等待测试结束，会生成色域报告，截图保存取名为默认模式色域。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_ADQLV" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="363" height="393" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NmViYzQzZmFiMTZlMDE0ZDNhNmU0ZGZjMjc3MDY3ZGFfTlJxcUxmMUxYV2VDZXlQWUFLdHpxaXVhMVZSODNQeXBfVG9rZW46UnZCdWJHZDhyb3pSZUV4MU8xZmNFOG42bmliXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NmViYzQzZmFiMTZlMDE0ZDNhNmU0ZGZjMjc3MDY3ZGFfTlJxcUxmMUxYV2VDZXlQWUFLdHpxaXVhMVZSODNQeXBfVG9rZW46UnZCdWJHZDhyb3pSZUV4MU8xZmNFOG42bmliXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>继续点击验证选项卡，确认设置里为刚才测试的 icm 文件，按下图设置进行验证，确认无误后点击测量报告。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_wUZ08" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="688" height="479" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmYyM2M4NTJlN2IxZmNlNGY2N2RkZmRiOGIxMTQ1YjZfYUNWeGNsNVU4UFI4eE9BRnh2N3BzUDhCOFRCa2IwbkpfVG9rZW46Q3RPWWJFQTV2b09rYzZ4a0ZlWmNLMGgwbk5lXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmYyM2M4NTJlN2IxZmNlNGY2N2RkZmRiOGIxMTQ1YjZfYUNWeGNsNVU4UFI4eE9BRnh2N3BzUDhCOFRCa2IwbkpfVG9rZW46Q3RPWWJFQTV2b09rYzZ4a0ZlWmNLMGgwbk5lXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>对于生成报告的数据解读，主要看Contrast(对比度)、Delta E(色准)、Measured whitepoint(测量白点值)。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_IICIn" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="733" height="735" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmU5YWZkZmZhYTRkMDEzZmE3MjY0ZjVhMjI4MDQyOGNfaFJmR3dRaGxTUnhYR0cxWmRMd0U4ajZ4a0ZUc2hXbG1fVG9rZW46VVZ4MGJzdTM3b0FzTGd4Uk56R2NhUFR6bkNiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmU5YWZkZmZhYTRkMDEzZmE3MjY0ZjVhMjI4MDQyOGNfaFJmR3dRaGxTUnhYR0cxWmRMd0U4ajZ4a0ZUc2hXbG1fVG9rZW46VVZ4MGJzdTM3b0FzTGd4Uk56R2NhUFR6bkNiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><img id="aimg_OpMmZ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="334" height="317" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTcyMzhmNTA0ZmMxNzhkNjcwNmViOWE4ZjQ1ZWIxZDFfWEk2aEwxRmNjSnh5UmtYVVZERW1QM20yWlQ1MmJ0WldfVG9rZW46WXREbWJTU0VJb0RVZ0p4VzRseWNrc3hvbjhmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTcyMzhmNTA0ZmMxNzhkNjcwNmViOWE4ZjQ1ZWIxZDFfWEk2aEwxRmNjSnh5UmtYVVZERW1QM20yWlQ1MmJ0WldfVG9rZW46WXREbWJTU0VJb0RVZ0p4VzRseWNrc3hvbjhmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>白点值可以前往 https:<font color="#6425d0">//www.waveformlighting.com/tech/calculate-duv-from-cie-1931-xy-coordinates</font>网址输入对应的 xy 坐标得到。（也可以直接通过Calman+CA410 测量，此步骤可以略过。）<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_MFqPF" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="361" height="194" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTEyYzYwYTgxZDM5NjU5OWI1NzIyNTRhOWQ5MDkwYWNfQUc0MXNSNFZwNHl3Z3daRXRBdXZIM3lEWkhyWGZUTk1fVG9rZW46TUIwU2JWQ1o5b2p2djh4SUpVNWM2U2ZibkdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTEyYzYwYTgxZDM5NjU5OWI1NzIyNTRhOWQ5MDkwYWNfQUc0MXNSNFZwNHl3Z3daRXRBdXZIM3lEWkhyWGZUTk1fVG9rZW46TUIwU2JWQ1o5b2p2djh4SUpVNWM2U2ZibkdiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><img id="aimg_QA7EU" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="323" height="365" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDU0MTVhYzFiNGY1NzBlMWYzYjcyOTc1MzJjYzE1NGNfc1NvSERkd2s4OVlEWDQzRGh2SktXY3pCWjZyWllGYXNfVG9rZW46UDczTmI5TDd4b2hNQ1h4NGhyMWMyTHpnbnBnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDU0MTVhYzFiNGY1NzBlMWYzYjcyOTc1MzJjYzE1NGNfc1NvSERkd2s4OVlEWDQzRGh2SktXY3pCWjZyWllGYXNfVG9rZW46UDczTmI5TDd4b2hNQ1h4NGhyMWMyTHpnbnBnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><br>
<ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>其他数据色温、Gamma、RGB 灰平衡、a*b*色域也可通过Calman+CA410 测量。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_G3zxV" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="720" height="456" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTI1MTFkMzcyMGZkZjhkNmM1MTcxMGNmMmJkMTE4NjhfQ1FXWnMxR25YNEpGMm1xS3BBTXd4ZGtMWUV1WXlQVVFfVG9rZW46U1BFbGJSbUJNb2ZTMmZ4eTlQU2NZOXUybjJmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTI1MTFkMzcyMGZkZjhkNmM1MTcxMGNmMmJkMTE4NjhfQ1FXWnMxR25YNEpGMm1xS3BBTXd4ZGtMWUV1WXlQVVFfVG9rZW46U1BFbGJSbUJNb2ZTMmZ4eTlQU2NZOXUybjJmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图是色温散点趋势图<img id="aimg_Qc1wV" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="720" height="454" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjEzOGJiMTA3ZjhkYTFjMGY2OWExOTZmZDQ4Y2E4MDZfeTZXd29wTURQSUVRbG5wdHZsZDVMMDZGa0tsbFVRRHdfVG9rZW46WHBScmIzYWxCb3B2ekp4dlBlSmNUUW4zbkFlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjEzOGJiMTA3ZjhkYTFjMGY2OWExOTZmZDQ4Y2E4MDZfeTZXd29wTURQSUVRbG5wdHZsZDVMMDZGa0tsbFVRRHdfVG9rZW46WHBScmIzYWxCb3B2ekp4dlBlSmNUUW4zbkFlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图是Gamma散点趋势图<img id="aimg_kOX3x" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="720" height="454" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDkzYzgxYmExYmFlNjExMDNhMjc1M2RlNGE0YjFlOTJfWDVRY0hNcHlCVjIzZDZnY2d0UWVrd2dPTHA1Y2NRaXhfVG9rZW46U044eWJXSG51b0lBb2l4NnZFNGNpWnZabk1kXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDkzYzgxYmExYmFlNjExMDNhMjc1M2RlNGE0YjFlOTJfWDVRY0hNcHlCVjIzZDZnY2d0UWVrd2dPTHA1Y2NRaXhfVG9rZW46U044eWJXSG51b0lBb2l4NnZFNGNpWnZabk1kXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图是RGB灰平衡散点趋势图<img id="aimg_AbXX5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="701" height="725" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDVjY2NkNzQ0ZTZiNDY4NjMxNzFjODE4OTQzM2YxOGJfdWlyVHhUQklUQTZzUWFpUEIwME5GMWNOTXNCdGVsbmhfVG9rZW46TnJNOGIwdVRrb0Q2NnZ4elJxcmNuclFwbjdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDVjY2NkNzQ0ZTZiNDY4NjMxNzFjODE4OTQzM2YxOGJfdWlyVHhUQklUQTZzUWFpUEIwME5GMWNOTXNCdGVsbmhfVG9rZW46TnJNOGIwdVRrb0Q2NnZ4elJxcmNuclFwbjdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图a*b*色域散点趋势图<ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将显示器切换到 sRGB 色彩空间后，重复 ①-⑩ 步骤，测量sRGB 模式下的色域截图保存取名为 sRGB 缩限模式峰值亮度和 sRGB 缩限模式色域即可。<br>
</li></ul><strong>十二、光谱图</strong><blockquote>DisplayCAL软件+i1Pro 2设备 </blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>常见的LCD 面板背光技术有 WLED、RGB-LED、GB-r LED、QLED（量子点）、MiniLED，以及老旧的 CCFL（灯管，非 LED），光谱分为 WLED、KSF、GB-r LED、QD&nbsp;&nbsp;量子点。背光通过导光板的反射来覆盖整个屏幕，传统 LED 设计为上下两灯管布局，然后再通过柔光层和棱镜层让光变得柔和具有指向性，接着通过偏振镜 POL 让只有垂直的光可以通过，最后光通过由 TFT 控制的液晶层 Cell 的偏转再穿过彩色滤光层 Color Filter，赋予色彩后再穿过一次偏振镜POL 显示到我们的眼睛中。<ul><li><strong>WLED：</strong>通过将白色背光层安放在液晶矩阵的背面（技术含量高，产品偏厚）或者侧面（技术难度低，迅速取代 CCFL）来进行发光，让颜色得以显现，本质就是白光LED 灯珠，成本低、发热量低、耐用、制造经验丰富等多个优点，缺点蓝光量大，对眼睛的伤害较大。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_n09j0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="673" height="370" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDJhZWVmZmZkYzA0YzkxNjEwNmQ0MGQ2YzdkZTQ3OWJfV2YzeTd6Z1hXdlh0ZnlBVXV6MlFGdFJKUW9OZ3NwN05fVG9rZW46VDdFRWJwUFJIb1ROWU54U2s5eWNTd0VubnRoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDJhZWVmZmZkYzA0YzkxNjEwNmQ0MGQ2YzdkZTQ3OWJfV2YzeTd6Z1hXdlh0ZnlBVXV6MlFGdFJKUW9OZ3NwN05fVG9rZW46VDdFRWJwUFJIb1ROWU54U2s5eWNTd0VubnRoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>KSF：</strong>在 WLED 背光的基础上添加一种含四价锰离子的氟硅酸钾的荧光粉，能够极大地提升液晶显示的色域覆盖率，由于 KSF 荧光粉的超窄半波宽光谱特征，使得其光谱在经过液晶面板时也能够有很高的色纯度，从而大大地提高了三原色三角形的面积，提升了 WLED 背光技术的显示器色域表现力。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_OwXhi" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="649" height="381" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2Y4YTYzYzhlMTI3Yzc5YjQyMmJlODhlOWViMjU2MjJfV2JRVFNMMmY0STUwbG5UaTNtQnlIak9qUFhpeFAxQTVfVG9rZW46T3owV2JxWmQ0bzYwM2p4ZUk3SWNvdkJkbjljXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2Y4YTYzYzhlMTI3Yzc5YjQyMmJlODhlOWViMjU2MjJfV2JRVFNMMmY0STUwbG5UaTNtQnlIak9qUFhpeFAxQTVfVG9rZW46T3owV2JxWmQ0bzYwM2p4ZUk3SWNvdkJkbjljXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>GB-rLED：</strong>背光源是将蓝色和绿色LED 与红色荧光粉结合在一起，这会让蓝色、绿色和红色的光均产生明显的光谱峰，能够还原出更加真实的颜色、更广的色域。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_lmqQo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="654" height="367" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTVmY2JmOTM1YzZiNTlmNjRkYzUwOWI4MzA5ZmI2MDRfeFFhdVNjdFdNWjQ1eE9DMk51akhSaTFVYzZjTlM5TDBfVG9rZW46VFRWWGJrcW9ibzFVMEd4anZVMGNCakg1bkFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTVmY2JmOTM1YzZiNTlmNjRkYzUwOWI4MzA5ZmI2MDRfeFFhdVNjdFdNWjQ1eE9DMk51akhSaTFVYzZjTlM5TDBfVG9rZW46VFRWWGJrcW9ibzFVMEd4anZVMGNCakg1bkFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>QD 量子点：</strong>让量子点彩色滤光片来取代传统的彩色滤光片，好处是改善现有彩色滤光片所带来的亮度有限的问题，同时增加色彩表现力，就是在 WLED 光源前加上一层量子点强化膜，通过 WLED 来给膜上的量子点提供能量，让它们呈现出红绿色，而蓝色背光层则保证了蓝光的纯净以及更佳的色域显示。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_x7RCg" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="691" height="384" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDE5ZjY4N2ZhZGVkY2QyMTE4YzgzZmQyZjNmNDJiYjJfTmFwMm1wU3RjMVpzbTMyZWlZM1IxVW9VRERkb3lQN3RfVG9rZW46V2hJRGJrUzFyb1o0aHV4Q2J5aWNqNFVxbnBkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDE5ZjY4N2ZhZGVkY2QyMTE4YzgzZmQyZjNmNDJiYjJfTmFwMm1wU3RjMVpzbTMyZWlZM1IxVW9VRERkb3lQN3RfVG9rZW46V2hJRGJrUzFyb1o0aHV4Q2J5aWNqNFVxbnBkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong>在 SDR 模式下讲脸啊高度调整最大，，对比度默认，色温选择用户。<ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 DisplayCAL，确认显示器及校色仪，注意这里的设备为 i1Pro 2。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_ejj4A" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="761" height="452" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjAxMzhiMWQwNjIyMzY0ZDY5MGY1OTcxYTVjNjg4NjBfUGg1YXZFZm9JVDlaM1NFRWt5b3l1SDZtUzhHRnprOXZfVG9rZW46WVpBbmJzcG5Tb2lCa0x4MUFKbWNTekZvbmtlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjAxMzhiMWQwNjIyMzY0ZDY5MGY1OTcxYTVjNjg4NjBfUGg1YXZFZm9JVDlaM1NFRWt5b3l1SDZtUzhHRnprOXZfVG9rZW46WVpBbmJzcG5Tb2lCa0x4MUFKbWNTekZvbmtlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>如果无法识别设备，请检查线材是否接好或更换端口，如果还是无法识别请安装驱动，工具-校色仪-安装 ArgllCMS 校色仪驱动程序。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_gIxYJ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="752" height="316" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmY1MTIxNzViMjU5YmM2YzlkODQwYmFiOTM5YWIyMzNfRG5peTd4TVVlN2VScHVMR1hMV1B4SldqdVh5c1BGRmNfVG9rZW46VURTcGI3SzJNb254Z094WVp6VWNhS2d3bkJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmY1MTIxNzViMjU5YmM2YzlkODQwYmFiOTM5YWIyMzNfRG5peTd4TVVlN2VScHVMR1hMV1B4SldqdVh5c1BGRmNfVG9rZW46VURTcGI3SzJNb254Z094WVp6VWNhS2d3bkJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>设备管理器里显示 Eye-One Pro（Argyll）为正常状态，在回到 DisplayCAL 软件里点击校色仪旁边的刷新图标。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_U6y6M" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="514" height="211" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWI4OTk2NGQzY2M1NGIzYWE4OTIwYzJiZmQ2MjI4ODNfUzZ0Z2tCck5mNjdMZUZxTVppbVlkZDMyMmJSMVVYMGxfVG9rZW46T2xaWmJka3BVb01WeGp4bk5VVmNLU0hubkdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWI4OTk2NGQzY2M1NGIzYWE4OTIwYzJiZmQ2MjI4ODNfUzZ0Z2tCck5mNjdMZUZxTVppbVlkZDMyMmJSMVVYMGxfVG9rZW46T2xaWmJka3BVb01WeGp4bk5VVmNLU0hubkdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击工具-校正文件-创建色度仪校正文件。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_G6Slg" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="753" height="331" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjNkODZlMjRjYTY5YWQ5YjAxYmI0OGVjYTA1NTQzMjNfZkFXZmJ1NWF4Rk81VGZpZG1rdjQ2cWltMTZ6QnRuVFdfVG9rZW46SXdJRWJJaVNmb3FoZm54ZHpNdmNyOHNObjhlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjNkODZlMjRjYTY5YWQ5YjAxYmI0OGVjYTA1NTQzMjNfZkFXZmJ1NWF4Rk81VGZpZG1rdjQ2cWltMTZ6QnRuVFdfVG9rZW46SXdJRWJJaVNmb3FoZm54ZHpNdmNyOHNObjhlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>选择光谱，点击测量。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_YBBCz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="724" height="371" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWJkNmZlOGFiMmM1NjFlYTI3MTQ3N2EyODI4NDRiNDFfVnA0c0JaNXRycG5jZUJMZm9UeU1lQU1oaUdacTFXNVVfVG9rZW46SUpyR2JnbVJRb1FLdVl4VzVZeGM4ZWpsbktjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWJkNmZlOGFiMmM1NjFlYTI3MTQ3N2EyODI4NDRiNDFfVnA0c0JaNXRycG5jZUJMZm9UeU1lQU1oaUdacTFXNVVfVG9rZW46SUpyR2JnbVJRb1FLdVl4VzVZeGM4ZWpsbktjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将校色底座向上推露出反色白点。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_ZNNIK" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="764" height="410" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWJhZDA3YTE1ZjAwNTJkNTM4MTM2ZWJlNjdlMjRjOGNfdkhKWUd4SnAzRTVHZXU3NlBlWm1xQkxQdkR0a0EzMWtfVG9rZW46RFNqVWJHQUpxb2ZXUWl4NkJiOGNFSGJFbkNkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWJhZDA3YTE1ZjAwNTJkNTM4MTM2ZWJlNjdlMjRjOGNfdkhKWUd4SnAzRTVHZXU3NlBlWm1xQkxQdkR0a0EzMWtfVG9rZW46RFNqVWJHQUpxb2ZXUWl4NkJiOGNFSGJFbkNkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将 ES-2000 探头水平放置于校色盖子上。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_Yi1z3" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="767" height="433" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGQ3YWI5YjJhZjczZjcxMWI0NWNiNTkxMGM2YzZlNjJfWktHMERaQjBZYzM2TDZvOW13UkdYc1RCeFpIWVZoMTRfVG9rZW46SXdrUmJETDBtbzJQU3V4MTVGamNobjY4bjNEXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGQ3YWI5YjJhZjczZjcxMWI0NWNiNTkxMGM2YzZlNjJfWktHMERaQjBZYzM2TDZvOW13UkdYc1RCeFpIWVZoMTRfVG9rZW46SXdrUmJETDBtbzJQU3V4MTVGamNobjY4bjNEXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击确定。</li><li>将设备挂在显示器测试窗口的正中间，保持设备与屏幕的贴合。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_WE01e" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="761" height="464" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzM5YThkZGZjZjk5Mzg5NGEzYTI0YzRjZTFlOTI0ZWRfT0Z5V29KREhhZlI4MmlRNk80Nm5QR1FUZGcyU2hUQnZfVG9rZW46RDNVcmJDazdWb0U2MlF4dERkZGMzMnZ0bnliXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzM5YThkZGZjZjk5Mzg5NGEzYTI0YzRjZTFlOTI0ZWRfT0Z5V29KREhhZlI4MmlRNk80Nm5QR1FUZGcyU2hUQnZfVG9rZW46RDNVcmJDazdWb0U2MlF4dERkZGMzMnZ0bnliXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击确定。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_wmN1O" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="656" height="298" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2IzY2MyYjNhMzRjZWI0NmRjZTZmY2VhYmRjZTc3MjZfanNXNzRod3hTUEc4Sm1uYjVENE9Wc0xCcVRNaG1BMmxfVG9rZW46UmZxTmI4Qmcwb2FCYnF4bEt1MGNHYlZqbjJkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2IzY2MyYjNhMzRjZWI0NmRjZTZmY2VhYmRjZTc3MjZfanNXNzRod3hTUEc4Sm1uYjVENE9Wc0xCcVRNaG1BMmxfVG9rZW46UmZxTmI4Qmcwb2FCYnF4bEt1MGNHYlZqbjJkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击色度仪校正信息。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_KEi77" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="713" height="138" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTk1ZGYxYWViY2QwZDczOGMyZTllNWU0MTYzZWE4YWRfRFVWRERrbG9GZk9yQVNSUGlxa2JWTVZ1RmFjZmV5YWZfVG9rZW46TWNPUGJEUHBzb1NoUTd4QjNNZmN5RWdHbkxiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTk1ZGYxYWViY2QwZDczOGMyZTllNWU0MTYzZWE4YWRfRFVWRERrbG9GZk9yQVNSUGlxa2JWTVZ1RmFjZmV5YWZfVG9rZW46TWNPUGJEUHBzb1NoUTd4QjNNZmN5RWdHbkxiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>对于数据的解读：下图中的红色区域为波峰，绿色区域为总的有害蓝光，橙色区域为测量出的有害蓝光。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_Fz2XC" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="738" height="400" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDhkYzM0NjU0NDMxNWFjNjVkOGI1OTUzMzBiNmQzNzZfeEFZTGtZTzNBOFBXOXE3NUZSeEFHQ3hEbHFkRlFJYTZfVG9rZW46Tm1ZMGJaR0Vmb1lrdVd4NkR2OWNlbGtwbm9nXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDhkYzM0NjU0NDMxNWFjNjVkOGI1OTUzMzBiNmQzNzZfeEFZTGtZTzNBOFBXOXE3NUZSeEFHQ3hEbHFkRlFJYTZfVG9rZW46Tm1ZMGJaR0Vmb1lrdVd4NkR2OWNlbGtwbm9nXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>查看蓝色波峰，超过 456nm 代表具备硬件防蓝光属性，</li><li>查看 415nm-455nm 有害蓝光的占比，＞50%视为不具备具备硬件低蓝光属性，＜50%视为具备硬件低蓝光属性。<br>
</li></ul><strong>十三、校准</strong><blockquote>Spyder XElite软件+Spyder X2设备 </blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 Spyder Xelite 软件，选择校准我的显示器，点击下一步。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_HZuVq" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="760" height="431" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDQ0MjBkMjk0NDc4Y2E0N2ZjZjBlZTJmY2NjYTQ5Y2FfZDNyR1dUaWxuRFdlUkhSSTdvWmRBUVlMZ3cyYkdYYUxfVG9rZW46Vk1qUmJmTmU2b05ETzB4VFBkamNPb1VYbnhzXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDQ0MjBkMjk0NDc4Y2E0N2ZjZjBlZTJmY2NjYTQ5Y2FfZDNyR1dUaWxuRFdlUkhSSTdvWmRBUVlMZ3cyYkdYYUxfVG9rZW46Vk1qUmJmTmU2b05ETzB4VFBkamNPb1VYbnhzXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>选择显示器分析，点击下一步。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_l5MA5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="755" height="426" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzMwZDRmOWVhYjEyYTE2MjRjYzM5NGY3ZTE5ZGE2YzRfbjFvbVk3dVhrTkU3Qzd6UmpIMHV3UjJMbXdvOXZHM2JfVG9rZW46S3hFU2JES0Zyb1pWckp4NzlUZmNMdmdYbk9lXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzMwZDRmOWVhYjEyYTE2MjRjYzM5NGY3ZTE5ZGE2YzRfbjFvbVk3dVhrTkU3Qzd6UmpIMHV3UjJMbXdvOXZHM2JfVG9rZW46S3hFU2JES0Zyb1pWckp4NzlUZmNMdmdYbk9lXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>确认显示器无误后，全部勾选点击开始测试。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_achTb" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="977" height="717" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzExZGIyZDc2MjVlNGVlNDg2YTViN2I4OTcxNmFjOWJfeXVGT25Gc0pmb2ZSTDhMWjliZXlPeHE0blprVGl2NWVfVG9rZW46TGxXSmJTbmo4b0NVaW14ZlVUb2NPT1M2bkdhXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzExZGIyZDc2MjVlNGVlNDg2YTViN2I4OTcxNmFjOWJfeXVGT25Gc0pmb2ZSTDhMWjliZXlPeHE0blprVGl2NWVfVG9rZW46TGxXSmJTbmo4b0NVaW14ZlVUb2NPT1M2bkdhXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将 Spyder X2 放置于提示框内，保持与屏幕的贴合，点击确认。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_QsoSv" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="756" height="317" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjJlY2U4MTlmNDI1ZjNhMzdjODVkMjgwNTJiYTI1OGJfUjhHcWl5Qjl0MUt4TVJKZHM1R0wxT2RSVFFXOWt2cDVfVG9rZW46SGdnRWJ1cGtEb0IyS3R4WWlFaGNIMGxHbk5jXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjJlY2U4MTlmNDI1ZjNhMzdjODVkMjgwNTJiYTI1OGJfUjhHcWl5Qjl0MUt4TVJKZHM1R0wxT2RSVFFXOWt2cDVfVG9rZW46SGdnRWJ1cGtEb0IyS3R4WWlFaGNIMGxHbk5jXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将设备置于白色方框内的中心位置，并保持贴合，一次测试每个格子。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_dsB8S" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="730" height="569" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmM4MmJiNGVkZDY4ODM5M2FlNTljZjY5YTk1MjUzZDBfVndjR1lsSGZmaXRHNm5PbDJHMjlaZHR6V25leVZWd3dfVG9rZW46QU9La2JRMUxub1BmODV4VWFsdWNjSjZKbnBmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmM4MmJiNGVkZDY4ODM5M2FlNTljZjY5YTk1MjUzZDBfVndjR1lsSGZmaXRHNm5PbDJHMjlaZHR6V25leVZWd3dfVG9rZW46QU9La2JRMUxub1BmODV4VWFsdWNjSjZKbnBmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>查看不同亮度下的屏幕均匀性，点击下一步。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_ehjBc" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="761" height="393" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDZmOGFjYTBlYWYwYjJmYmVhZjdhNDM3MzAxZTA5YTdfQjF4b09NdWVDenJCUmR6UzBrQTVTd01aOUxOWjZwMjZfVG9rZW46UmVZbmJnY2VtbzNOUWh4QkZ2NGNnU0xCblZjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDZmOGFjYTBlYWYwYjJmYmVhZjdhNDM3MzAxZTA5YTdfQjF4b09NdWVDenJCUmR6UzBrQTVTd01aOUxOWjZwMjZfVG9rZW46UmVZbmJnY2VtbzNOUWh4QkZ2NGNnU0xCblZjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>这里点击否，（实际情况可以查看，OSD 菜单中是否预设有不同的 Gamma 值，若有按不同的值测量）<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_O3V6Z" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="974" height="715" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzQyMWFiYjM1YmM2OGZmNTIzNjI5M2VlZGIwYTgzZDRfdnFUWmFhdDZUTW5ONGtXZ2JHandVaE1nOHA3b20wUWJfVG9rZW46TWUxWmJyQ3llb2YxQW54NWtWdGN3QXhmbkVoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzQyMWFiYjM1YmM2OGZmNTIzNjI5M2VlZGIwYTgzZDRfdnFUWmFhdDZUTW5ONGtXZ2JHandVaE1nOHA3b20wUWJfVG9rZW46TWUxWmJyQ3llb2YxQW54NWtWdGN3QXhmbkVoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击开始测试。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_O0192" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="973" height="663" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjlhZDNjMDAwZTY2NWZhYTNmODQ0OTQyNDYyNzNlNmFfTk8zbGkxVm5oQ2Z2Z05nRE4xQnBrZW5FQWtsODlQZ2hfVG9rZW46SXpYcWJQbXlJb2JtSmV4ZGNCdGNMTlNFbk1mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjlhZDNjMDAwZTY2NWZhYTNmODQ0OTQyNDYyNzNlNmFfTk8zbGkxVm5oQ2Z2Z05nRE4xQnBrZW5FQWtsODlQZ2hfVG9rZW46SXpYcWJQbXlJb2JtSmV4ZGNCdGNMTlNFbk1mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>记录默认亮度值，根据提示设置依次设置显示器的亮度：0%-25%-50%-75%-100%，测试后将亮度复位为默认值。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_k55Xr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="810" height="342" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTNhNWI4NjE0MTk0NjY0NzRkOGU5MjllYWIwNGRmYzZfYkR0dlVQeHN2a0NtSmdoUng5VGRjc2tNWGxiVVdhajBfVG9rZW46RG1rMWJTaGlTb0h6U2N4MDA3dWNuTTk5bkpkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTNhNWI4NjE0MTk0NjY0NzRkOGU5MjllYWIwNGRmYzZfYkR0dlVQeHN2a0NtSmdoUng5VGRjc2tNWGxiVVdhajBfVG9rZW46RG1rMWJTaGlTb0h6U2N4MDA3dWNuTTk5bkpkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击是。<br>
