</li></ul><img id="aimg_OgBBs" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="975" height="445" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTc4NzIzMjQxZTdjNWMwZWU2ZWVjMGI0OTkzOWRhOWRfWDFvUHpaR3ViTno0a0Y2aXhvVlVZa3ZsWXVaYlltQVNfVG9rZW46TWczdmJPWndNb2RIbHF4QjdvUWNKNXlTbkpkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTc4NzIzMjQxZTdjNWMwZWU2ZWVjMGI0OTkzOWRhOWRfWDFvUHpaR3ViTno0a0Y2aXhvVlVZa3ZsWXVaYlltQVNfVG9rZW46TWczdmJPWndNb2RIbHF4QjdvUWNKNXlTbkpkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>填写对应信息：OSD 名称及OSD 设置。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_xfFXM" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="976" height="664" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Nzc4ODU2MTUzNDlkZDE0YWU5ZjQxMzZlZjc2NDUxZjJfTGFPNnVRT25FMFdIbFYwWHIxM3NBWWo5bXdwbTU5NkVfVG9rZW46UGtVOWJCdUFLb2VvMm94aGdueWNjYzFUbkxnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Nzc4ODU2MTUzNDlkZDE0YWU5ZjQxMzZlZjc2NDUxZjJfTGFPNnVRT25FMFdIbFYwWHIxM3NBWWo5bXdwbTU5NkVfVG9rZW46UGtVOWJCdUFLb2VvMm94aGdueWNjYzFUbkxnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>测量颜色组选择 SpyderCheckr-48.txt。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_opsRL" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="719" height="253" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTIyNTlkMWU5YTFiNTIyODc0YjMxYzcxY2VjZjNjNmVfRDFnYWZVblpFRGE5Tm9za2QwOXhEMzMzSzlwc2VjaGxfVG9rZW46RTJ4VmJObTlrb0VHSjd4am5td2NMVnRzbjZnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTIyNTlkMWU5YTFiNTIyODc0YjMxYzcxY2VjZjNjNmVfRDFnYWZVblpFRGE5Tm9za2QwOXhEMzMzSzlwc2VjaGxfVG9rZW46RTJ4VmJObTlrb0VHSjd4am5td2NMVnRzbjZnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>保存测试后的报告，文件名名填写显示器型号，保存路径选择对于型号下的 Spyder X2 文件夹。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_btxMT" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="940" height="522" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmViMTI2ZTQzNjk0MTlmNjRhM2E3NzdjZDYxODdiYWVfdE5Eckt5WDRlYzBsZjIxSjI4dWFPVUQ5OWprSTZVbnFfVG9rZW46WVpUaGI0ZGtqbzcycWx4ZzljbWNJQkRTbkFoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmViMTI2ZTQzNjk0MTlmNjRhM2E3NzdjZDYxODdiYWVfdE5Eckt5WDRlYzBsZjIxSjI4dWFPVUQ5OWprSTZVbnFfVG9rZW46WVpUaGI0ZGtqbzcycWx4ZzljbWNJQkRTbkFoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 数据解读</font></strong>报告保存后会显示对应的测量结果，每一项截图保存，对于数据的解读。<img id="aimg_Lzv8R" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="817" height="167" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDE5NjI2YjNlNGUwZjMzODFmOWNjODllZGJkNzUzNmNfdEZnTm1vTUZobUVOTnpHVWVJWmZBbWRUN1lFRjVQakVfVG9rZW46SXJwUWJ2dWxlb241YWF4U3BzWmNRRkRQbkZjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDE5NjI2YjNlNGUwZjMzODFmOWNjODllZGJkNzUzNmNfdEZnTm1vTUZobUVOTnpHVWVJWmZBbWRUN1lFRjVQakVfVG9rZW46SXJwUWJ2dWxlb241YWF4U3BzWmNRRkRQbkZjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>色域<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_xpipA" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="410" height="512" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MGY1ZjNiNzQzY2I0MzFkYzJmNjY4OTZkODAxMzU4ZWFfUGJzYkZ1dzBQWGFVUDd2S0NSYm5hZ0tHSEVTeGQxNjJfVG9rZW46RDVrVGJ4MU1Yb25qOUR4TjhUQ2NaU2I4bmtlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MGY1ZjNiNzQzY2I0MzFkYzJmNjY4OTZkODAxMzU4ZWFfUGJzYkZ1dzBQWGFVUDd2S0NSYm5hZ0tHSEVTeGQxNjJfVG9rZW46RDVrVGJ4MU1Yb25qOUR4TjhUQ2NaU2I4bmtlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>色调响应<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_HGJbf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="519" height="302" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDhiMDhhODMxMDE4MWQ1OWVmYWM5MTEwZTdkMmI2OGNfNE1lc2NIV2lnamZ0WjIyQUI2UHJDMm9Odnp1SE9TUU1fVG9rZW46UFhjd2Jkd3VHb3FVaEx4TGZtYWN3d1Q0bkdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDhiMDhhODMxMDE4MWQ1OWVmYWM5MTEwZTdkMmI2OGNfNE1lc2NIV2lnamZ0WjIyQUI2UHJDMm9Odnp1SE9TUU1fVG9rZW46UFhjd2Jkd3VHb3FVaEx4TGZtYWN3d1Q0bkdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>亮度与对比度<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_UdwpY" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="600" height="172" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzkzMTNhZGExYzM0NDk3YjhhZGUyNWFlOWEzOTBhMGJfT2tCZHRpb2FaREFhRjZEanpNS1NvR1ROTGxYc3NQMzJfVG9rZW46THFUYmI3ZGJKb1ZjaFZ4NFVQWmNUbjdxbk1mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzkzMTNhZGExYzM0NDk3YjhhZGUyNWFlOWEzOTBhMGJfT2tCZHRpb2FaREFhRjZEanpNS1NvR1ROTGxYc3NQMzJfVG9rZW46THFUYmI3ZGJKb1ZjaFZ4NFVQWmNUbjdxbk1mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>OSD 设 置<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_UAPQZ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="597" height="97" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTMzMTQ4ZDYxNTYyZDE3OWRjNzM3ZWMxZDgxOTEzMGJfeWZRbmNiZU9jQ2wwN2w4dW1WTEdoNVh3b0dmUmp1azRfVG9rZW46TGhSemJ2a3Bob1A5b2N4ajl2WWNnRnBRbmJjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTMzMTQ4ZDYxNTYyZDE3OWRjNzM3ZWMxZDgxOTEzMGJfeWZRbmNiZU9jQ2wwN2w4dW1WTEdoNVh3b0dmUmp1azRfVG9rZW46TGhSemJ2a3Bob1A5b2N4ajl2WWNnRnBRbmJjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>屏幕均匀性<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_SKzkr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="854" height="355" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzUwNGM1M2Y5NWY0N2ExMTIyNGZkZWUwNmM3ZDA3ZTNfcUt1MjcxRWlLOTNYNzFkcEVQWGs5WkJ1SUwwMkxQSTJfVG9rZW46SlR1NWJ4ckttb2t6UGF4NzdpOWNleFlJbmJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzUwNGM1M2Y5NWY0N2ExMTIyNGZkZWUwNmM3ZDA3ZTNfcUt1MjcxRWlLOTNYNzFkcEVQWGs5WkJ1SUwwMkxQSTJfVG9rZW46SlR1NWJ4ckttb2t6UGF4NzdpOWNleFlJbmJiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li>色彩精确度<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_pKyws" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="555" height="206" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDdmNzNmODE0YTI2ZGIwZjQyZDA2NDEzNzkxNDhiNDBfd0IxVVZqcUNFRmZyTXJGc0taWWhxSWJLOVJ3YlJpVzVfVG9rZW46TUNOOWJ1OWdRb3owT0t4MzJDV2NIdUN2bnRlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDdmNzNmODE0YTI2ZGIwZjQyZDA2NDEzNzkxNDhiNDBfd0IxVVZqcUNFRmZyTXJGc0taWWhxSWJLOVJ3YlJpVzVfVG9rZW46TUNOOWJ1OWdRb3owT0t4MzJDV2NIdUN2bnRlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><br>
<ul><li>显示器额定值<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_qJjq9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="601" height="409" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODM2Yzk1YzNhMTdiOTVmNjVhNGViN2FkNDBiYTFhYzJfeTJvM1lTaTYyME5GQzdOOHBVWVB1N3Z3UklNVjJWRnRfVG9rZW46RjFuUmI0M0RJb1REZlJ4cFY0YmNpQ2Jybk5mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODM2Yzk1YzNhMTdiOTVmNjVhNGViN2FkNDBiYTFhYzJfeTJvM1lTaTYyME5GQzdOOHBVWVB1N3Z3UklNVjJWRnRfVG9rZW46RjFuUmI0M0RJb1REZlJ4cFY0YmNpQ2Jybk5mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong>十四、SDR模式</strong><blockquote><strong>Calman软件+CA410设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 基础步骤</font></strong>在测试之前需要验证出默认模式下的色温是 6500K 还是 7500K，以及色准是基于哪种标准参数测试，因此在正式测试前需要做额外测试。Whitepoint 这一项参数先选择 DCI Whitepoint 后再选择对应模式下的参数，可防止参数变化。先按 sRGB 参数跑一次 Grayscale-Multi（灰阶平衡），查看 Avg CCT（色温）的值，<font color="#2ea121"><strong>如果＜7000K：</strong></font>接着按 sRGB 参数测色准，再按分别按 Adobe RGB、DCI P3、Display P3 的三种对应的参数测试色准，查看四张测试结果Avg dE200（平均色准），以值最小的一张为默认模式色准，并记下对应参数，进行其他项目的测试。<font color="#2ea121"><strong>如果＞7000K：</strong></font>将 Whitepoint 参数改成 D75，并且后面测试时的 Whitepoint 参数皆需要改成D75，每个参数下跑一次色准，查看四张测试结果 Avg dE200（平均色准），以值最小的一张为默认模式色准，并记下对应参数，进行其他项目的测试。<ul><li><strong>sRGB 参数：</strong>Range：PC(0-255)、Colorspace：rec.709/sRGB、Whitepoint：D65、Gamma Formula：sRGB。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_DbO1L" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="769" height="363" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2JkNjE0ZDViNTMwYzg2ZGYzNmNhNTgzMGU1ODRjYTFfZ0ZEWTdSTUhTc2xyMmwxa01sTllVcmFIOEFCdXhQY09fVG9rZW46Q3Qza2JnSjVGb1hsM0p4NGFIQmM1YWVpbnZmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2JkNjE0ZDViNTMwYzg2ZGYzNmNhNTgzMGU1ODRjYTFfZ0ZEWTdSTUhTc2xyMmwxa01sTllVcmFIOEFCdXhQY09fVG9rZW46Q3Qza2JnSjVGb1hsM0p4NGFIQmM1YWVpbnZmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>Adobe RGB 参数：</strong>Range：PC(0-255)、Colorspace：AdobeRGB、Whitepoint：D65、Gamma Formula：Power 2.2。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_r8YOr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="792" height="378" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTMzZDg1YTI1ODkwOTZhYmUyZTI1ZDlhNjI1NGI5ZmVfTDN5QW5sTGVVMFlzM1V6Zkg2WnhWaUVkWFJVS1JxVGNfVG9rZW46RVV5YWJKS0JRb3ZWUVZ4dXdIRmNxVU1VbkhmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTMzZDg1YTI1ODkwOTZhYmUyZTI1ZDlhNjI1NGI5ZmVfTDN5QW5sTGVVMFlzM1V6Zkg2WnhWaUVkWFJVS1JxVGNfVG9rZW46RVV5YWJKS0JRb3ZWUVZ4dXdIRmNxVU1VbkhmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>DCI P3 参数：</strong>Range：PC(0-255)、Colorspace：DCI P3、Whitepoint：DCI Whitepoint、Gamma Formula：Power 2.6。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_OXllu" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="808" height="380" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MWEwOGViMWEyM2UzMGExNmFhY2Q1ODY5ODA4Y2FjY2RfallwekFLWGkyMjF5OUR0ZEtSbTljNVlKQ1ZzcDRDblJfVG9rZW46UEZjMGJKSUFSb1ZJMFl4dldYYmNlWFpNbnBjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MWEwOGViMWEyM2UzMGExNmFhY2Q1ODY5ODA4Y2FjY2RfallwekFLWGkyMjF5OUR0ZEtSbTljNVlKQ1ZzcDRDblJfVG9rZW46UEZjMGJKSUFSb1ZJMFl4dldYYmNlWFpNbnBjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul><li><strong>Display P3 参数：</strong>Range：PC(0-255)、Colorspace：DCI P3、Whitepoint：D65、Gamma Formula：Power 2.2。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_UXaNe" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="778" height="362" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTI5MTkxYWQyZTEzNGMyNWM2ODA2ZGJhY2VkZmRhZDRfanowNmtxNExYaW5DaWNnV0t6alZLQWdLdDRyM2JxOHJfVG9rZW46TnpMbWJnMWk4b2VGNG94RUlkVmNENDdabkJmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTI5MTkxYWQyZTEzNGMyNWM2ODA2ZGJhY2VkZmRhZDRfanowNmtxNExYaW5DaWNnV0t6alZLQWdLdDRyM2JxOHJfVG9rZW46TnpMbWJnMWk4b2VGNG94RUlkVmNENDdabkJmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 默认模式</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>主机接入两台显示器，将未测试那台设置主屏，准备测试的那台设未副屏，接着打开 Calman 软件，再弹出窗口里的 Workflow（工作流）菜单项里选择（Analysis）SDR Toolkit（SDR 测试工具），点击 Start Session（开始）。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_Mo509" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="792" height="429" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODFjYzQyODcyMzE1NjkwNjQwYjc4NmE2YWJjMzZlNjRfTHdVYWVqaFVVNnMyNjFkdTBTZVVTUjljUjZtNFFQcnBfVG9rZW46RzRHVmJXWGQ4b0o3Vk14bFZvOGMyYVF6bjlkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODFjYzQyODcyMzE1NjkwNjQwYjc4NmE2YWJjMzZlNjRfTHdVYWVqaFVVNnMyNjFkdTBTZVVTUjljUjZtNFFQcnBfVG9rZW46RzRHVmJXWGQ4b0o3Vk14bFZvOGMyYVF6bjlkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击 Find Meter（查找设备）。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_IB1Rr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="467" height="312" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTA2M2Y2YzVjYTBmZTc2YjJlZTUzZDM3MTlhMmZiYzNfaUN6MU1oQmpXOXluSFY0QUxpV1E5QnZQRmhmMDFMQ0JfVG9rZW46WUhDcmJNZHBQb2VuUkp4U1VrVWNWR3B2bjBiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTA2M2Y2YzVjYTBmZTc2YjJlZTUzZDM3MTlhMmZiYzNfaUN6MU1oQmpXOXluSFY0QUxpV1E5QnZQRmhmMDFMQ0JfVG9rZW46WUhDcmJNZHBQb2VuUkp4U1VrVWNWR3B2bjBiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>勾选 Konica Minolta CS-200，CA-210/310/402/410/427（USB）后，点击 Serach（搜索）按钮。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_K87jL" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="436" height="541" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NmRlMWQyMzkyMTA2MDkwZjZhNWMwYmZjNWM3OGE2OTdfcmkzTTNwQ09qZXRNUjlhZ3RLZXhxRVJDcnBHeFU2ZHBfVG9rZW46QmhzN2JUd3FZbzNRUjZ4QkRTRGN6anh6bndiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NmRlMWQyMzkyMTA2MDkwZjZhNWMwYmZjNWM3OGE2OTdfcmkzTTNwQ09qZXRNUjlhZ3RLZXhxRVJDcnBHeFU2ZHBfVG9rZW46QmhzN2JUd3FZbzNRUjZ4QkRTRGN6anh6bndiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>确认设备的连接，正常时 CA410 灯为常亮状态，且左边的指示条为绿色，设备名字为白色，圆圈里的初始数值为 60（分钟），运行时间越长数值越小，数值为 0 且显示红色需进行零电平校准，点击Initalizs Meter（初始化）进行校准。测试过程中 Source（信号源）右边的指示条会闪烁，测试完成时为浅黄色。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_b980I" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="468" height="421" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NmNhN2Q1YmE5ODkyNzlhN2IxYjg1MjdkZmI1NmJkNDJfZlNKVVJGMUtoQ2pjQWdsa2ZxVGxqZVhXZUV1WDV6RXJfVG9rZW46WnI5TGJtQk5mb3U3U054UnBub2NVSVMxblFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NmNhN2Q1YmE5ODkyNzlhN2IxYjg1MjdkZmI1NmJkNDJfZlNKVVJGMUtoQ2pjQWdsa2ZxVGxqZVhXZUV1WDV6RXJfVG9rZW46WnI5TGJtQk5mb3U3U054UnBub2NVSVMxblFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><img id="aimg_ZzoZv" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="340" height="296" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTc2NmQ3YTlmNGJkNmE0ODI0NWM1YjI2YWEwMDQyMDVfVVl4c2FqNHlWYWl5NERIUFBKejZXTG1FQVpyNk43VTFfVG9rZW46Rk1ocWJ5T0Njb0JYUHZ4aG55cGNUUU54bkJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTc2NmQ3YTlmNGJkNmE0ODI0NWM1YjI2YWEwMDQyMDVfVVl4c2FqNHlWYWl5NERIUFBKejZXTG1FQVpyNk43VTFfVG9rZW46Rk1ocWJ5T0Njb0JYUHZ4aG55cGNUUU54bkJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>检查信号源，使用 CA410 只需要点击Open Pattern Window（打开图案窗口）。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_fToiT" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="580" height="632" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmI0YTRiNTk3M2Y4MTQyOTZhYmQ2MDM4MjExNWU2NWVfNlRxWFg0cEozNDJub1VkcFZ4aldDYkJmVlVxeU9PNG5fVG9rZW46TkRSV2JObnNHb0VNMDB4SE1rSWNJRTZubnFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmI0YTRiNTk3M2Y4MTQyOTZhYmQ2MDM4MjExNWU2NWVfNlRxWFg0cEozNDJub1VkcFZ4aldDYkJmVlVxeU9PNG5fVG9rZW46TkRSV2JObnNHb0VNMDB4SE1rSWNJRTZubnFmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将窗口移动到测试的显示器上，并最大化。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_j2XYX" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="907" height="232" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjNmYzA3ZDZiZTgwMDI1MGNmNjZhMmI4MmFhZDBiZDZfNzk3SmRsQUoxRWZVZ2FJeG5TRVdTVlMzd3htQjZrRVVfVG9rZW46V003V2IwRE1nb3JpSnZ4MVhVaGN6YWQzbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjNmYzA3ZDZiZTgwMDI1MGNmNjZhMmI4MmFhZDBiZDZfNzk3SmRsQUoxRWZVZ2FJeG5TRVdTVlMzd3htQjZrRVVfVG9rZW46V003V2IwRE1nb3JpSnZ4MVhVaGN6YWQzbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将仪器置于屏幕前面的居中位置，仪器需垂直于屏幕并保持贴合状态。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_t6cSr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="564" height="215" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTk2Y2M1ZTM1YjQyMDdiZmJjYzhhZTdhYTg3ZThhMWVfdTM1ZThEdHIzd1lGYmVmRm9OUUhoNVRuODg2aW5ieHVfVG9rZW46UnlNOWJxVHVPb3dVYkh4Sm5yWmN0Wmt0bnJoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTk2Y2M1ZTM1YjQyMDdiZmJjYzhhZTdhYTg3ZThhMWVfdTM1ZThEdHIzd1lGYmVmRm9OUUhoNVRuODg2aW5ieHVfVG9rZW46UnlNOWJxVHVPb3dVYkh4Sm5yWmN0Wmt0bnJoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">③ </font><font color="#245bdb">软件界面</font></strong>确认以上步骤确认无误后，且色温、色准参数都已确认，再进行如下项目测试。测试项目有色准、色域、白点值、Gamma 值（Gamma 曲线）、亮度对比度、屏幕均匀性、EOTF 曲线、暗场调教共 8 项，每测试完成一项截图保存，取名为对应模式下的对应测试内容。色准和色域目前有 CIE1976（生理模型）和 CIE1931（照明模型）两套标准，CIE1976 为uv 坐标，CIE1931 为 xy 坐标，前者引入了 CIELAB 色差公式，提供更准确、更通用的方法来描述更广泛颜色范围内的色差。<ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>软件路径如下图：</strong>calman（卡尔曼）-Open WorkFlow Template（开发工作流程模板）-Analysis（分析）-SDR Toolkit（SDR 工具）。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_TpiG0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="701" height="433" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OGRhYmUzOThiZDY2M2I5MzJhNzFhYzc2ZTUxNzExZGZfSjRpNDU3M3IyZzFjSWtUZUxvcjJRTjZRQjlrSzYzeGFfVG9rZW46QTJZWmJWUVQ5b3RNR0l4NzlIUmNqSmxobnhoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OGRhYmUzOThiZDY2M2I5MzJhNzFhYzc2ZTUxNzExZGZfSjRpNDU3M3IyZzFjSWtUZUxvcjJRTjZRQjlrSzYzeGFfVG9rZW46QTJZWmJWUVQ5b3RNR0l4NzlIUmNqSmxobnhoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li><strong>软件操作说明如下图：</strong>点击 Read Series（读取数据）开始，测试过程呈浅灰色，完成后呈深灰色。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_rxmx9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="759" height="369" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YzhhNjYwZTMxYWFkZmJkOGIzNjFiOGIxMTE0ZWQ1NDNfeWNkVlJ3a0t1YXNpVXo2S2FWQWRid0tycmoxQlBobGxfVG9rZW46QUZjU2IwWlJIb3I5MUh4R1N5bWN0T0lWbmNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YzhhNjYwZTMxYWFkZmJkOGIzNjFiOGIxMTE0ZWQ1NDNfeWNkVlJ3a0t1YXNpVXo2S2FWQWRid0tycmoxQlBobGxfVG9rZW46QUZjU2IwWlJIb3I5MUh4R1N5bWN0T0lWbmNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><font color="#245bdb">色准</font><img id="aimg_TAfSH" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="775" height="437" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjcwYzg1ZTIxZDg4MTY4ZGMwYzhkMDNhZGUzZjU4ZGFfNTU3RDl0NkRmeE1sRk9wZ0lMeTlHVjdMZzdKRmFuWkJfVG9rZW46RlhycWJjOEdOb0RJcnl4VkhaTWM3T01lbkxnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjcwYzg1ZTIxZDg4MTY4ZGMwYzhkMDNhZGUzZjU4ZGFfNTU3RDl0NkRmeE1sRk9wZ0lMeTlHVjdMZzdKRmFuWkJfVG9rZW46RlhycWJjOEdOb0RJcnl4VkhaTWM3T01lbkxnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>色准：ColorChecher</strong>）路径<font color="#245bdb"><strong>色域</strong></font><img id="aimg_VCacn" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="586" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWI3OWQyYzQxNjUyNTBiNmIzZWYzNjgxYWFiYjFiY2JfTGRvVVYwNExjSHlkQjFnaFdRQk5vaHpCVUNPTHBETEFfVG9rZW46UmMxZGJPbG5ob3FPRWJ4UlUwbWNEWks4blllXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" Gamut</strong>）路径<font color="#245bdb"><strong>白点值</strong></font><img id="aimg_eoZ4o" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="772" height="354" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YjZmYjJkYzhjODg1NDY1M2IzNzA4OGFjODJhNjBiMWNfWmpEVXlDdTBJN2RObkdLYUVNMkdTQ1RobU9KRXVvdURfVG9rZW46VHc5b2JMVGNUb1VyeWt4cmxMTGN1WDJrbmFlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YjZmYjJkYzhjODg1NDY1M2IzNzA4OGFjODJhNjBiMWNfWmpEVXlDdTBJN2RObkdLYUVNMkdTQ1RobU9KRXVvdURfVG9rZW46VHc5b2JMVGNUb1VyeWt4cmxMTGN1WDJrbmFlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>白点值：3D LUT</strong>）路径<font color="#245bdb"><strong>Gamma</strong></font><strong>Gamma 值/Gamma 曲线/伽马Grayscale – Multi</strong>（灰阶平衡），可以查看 Avg CCT（色温）、Contrast Ratio（对比度）、Average Gamma（Gamma 值和曲线），Gamma 曲线实测值高于标准值，（黄色为标准值，灰色为实测值，两条曲线越贴合越好）画面显示更亮，实测值低于标准值，画面显示更暗。<img id="aimg_fiIo1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="772" height="436" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTgyOWE1MDE4OTE1OGQ2OGM0OTNlZTBkZTRmYzZjYWNfN1lRNVR1a3I0NmlrcEZMZmxSNHlGeFVjWUhxVWQzTHFfVG9rZW46QmJvemJNWHBmb1ZRVkF4Qm5RUmNXUkNCbmVnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTgyOWE1MDE4OTE1OGQ2OGM0OTNlZTBkZTRmYzZjYWNfN1lRNVR1a3I0NmlrcEZMZmxSNHlGeFVjWUhxVWQzTHFfVG9rZW46QmJvemJNWHBmb1ZRVkF4Qm5RUmNXUkNCbmVnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>Gamma 值/Gamma 曲线/伽马</strong>）路径<font color="#245bdb"><strong>亮度对比度</strong></font><strong>亮度对比度：</strong>需要测试两次，一次为默认亮度对比度，另一次将亮度调到 100%为峰值亮度对比度，截图保存后在复位为默认亮度。<font color="#2ea121">路径</font><strong>软件路径：</strong>calman（卡尔曼）-Open WorkFlow Template（开发工作流程模板）-Analysis（分析）-Contrast Ratio Tests（对比度测试）。<img id="aimg_L030h" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="771" height="433" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Y2I5ZDI2NmM3YWNiOTNlY2U5MWYyZTFlMzhmZGQyZDlfam04V21DZ2VNZ3pmNExKSFVrdVRGNkhTdXJlNVFwUUJfVG9rZW46UkhPYmJEUnJWb0FGREl4UERZZWNiM1Z3bjVjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Y2I5ZDI2NmM3YWNiOTNlY2U5MWYyZTFlMzhmZGQyZDlfam04V21DZ2VNZ3pmNExKSFVrdVRGNkhTdXJlNVFwUUJfVG9rZW46UkhPYmJEUnJWb0FGREl4UERZZWNiM1Z3bjVjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>亮度对比度 Contrast Ratio Tests</strong>）路径<font color="#2ea121">数据</font>点击 Sequential Contrast（顺序对比）子菜单开始测试，White Luminance（白场亮度）Black Luminance（黑场亮度）Sequential Contrast Ratio（连续对比度）<img id="aimg_rmTrZ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="776" height="436" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDZjYmIyNjdlMjU4OGM0YjQyZDE2N2JiNWViZDc1MzZfVExtYVVyeXM5UktoaGFlUjhjdTBYc3pCa2E2enQzeG9fVG9rZW46WHlncGJ2WnN3b0t0SFF4YTRZb2M2U1g2bk1YXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDZjYmIyNjdlMjU4OGM0YjQyZDE2N2JiNWViZDc1MzZfVExtYVVyeXM5UktoaGFlUjhjdTBYc3pCa2E2enQzeG9fVG9rZW46WHlncGJ2WnN3b0t0SFF4YTRZb2M2U1g2bk1YXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>亮度对比度 Contrast Ratio Tests</strong>）数据<font color="#245bdb"><strong>帧内对比度</strong></font><font color="#2ea121">路径</font>calman（卡尔曼）-Open WorkFlow Template（开发工作流程模板）-Analysis（分析）-Intra-Frame Contrast（帧内对比度）。<img id="aimg_Ja8Mi" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="798" height="432" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTQ2NzllOGNmNDk3MGUwYzU5MjMyMjYzMDNlNTg1NGZfY0RadnYzNDBXWVVFV0Z5cFNYcWduZUVOMDZqeEJPcHdfVG9rZW46WlRXOGIwZlpVb3doV3B4Y2UwUmNnT2p4blNiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTQ2NzllOGNmNDk3MGUwYzU5MjMyMjYzMDNlNTg1NGZfY0RadnYzNDBXWVVFV0Z5cFNYcWduZUVOMDZqeEJPcHdfVG9rZW46WlRXOGIwZlpVb3doV3B4Y2UwUmNnT2p4blNiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>帧内对比度Intra-Frame Contrast</strong>）路径<font color="#2ea121">步骤</font><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>根据提示将仪器放在红框的居中位置，按顺序依次测试。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_ClBfr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="807" height="453" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MGRkNTM0NmNhYTAwNTMxZGUwNWUwYzBmZjJiZDg2Y2NfSzlaY0FBS0M0OEdVaVBVc1RuRmhMNkZnN0lpN3NucVZfVG9rZW46UW9uUGJucnEwb0lPaVJ4MHZ4WGNjVkhDbjJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MGRkNTM0NmNhYTAwNTMxZGUwNWUwYzBmZjJiZDg2Y2NfSzlaY0FBS0M0OEdVaVBVc1RuRmhMNkZnN0lpN3NucVZfVG9rZW46UW9uUGJucnEwb0lPaVJ4MHZ4WGNjVkhDbjJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>实测界面如下图。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_Iy8Jb" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="820" height="341" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YzBlMGUxMmIyYTRmYWM2MjBmMDNjNWQ5ZWU0ZTQwZWZfSGpoeVJ5bkZ6bThqWjlsZFlHc2VscHZYcElUbzl2aU5fVG9rZW46UlN6YWJJQlVOb0ZGb054TEtRbmNIamR6bmM5XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YzBlMGUxMmIyYTRmYWM2MjBmMDNjNWQ5ZWU0ZTQwZWZfSGpoeVJ5bkZ6bThqWjlsZFlHc2VscHZYcElUbzl2aU5fVG9rZW46UlN6YWJJQlVOb0ZGb054TEtRbmNIamR6bmM5XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>测试结束如下图。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_iZEGe" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="789" height="442" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmI2MWZiMzhlZjY5MzBmZjdlNDBjNmQzMjZjNzA5NjVfMTZiM0JsYWhRWnJRemhLdUs1QWU5YlFvdHNoaDJlNFFfVG9rZW46Tks4bGJUbVJ6bzNoZVR4VU9BRmN0NzMxblBlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmI2MWZiMzhlZjY5MzBmZjdlNDBjNmQzMjZjNzA5NjVfMTZiM0JsYWhRWnJRemhLdUs1QWU5YlFvdHNoaDJlNFFfVG9rZW46Tks4bGJUbVJ6bzNoZVR4VU9BRmN0NzMxblBlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><font color="#2ea121">数据</font>CR（帧内对比度）数值越大越好，整体的数越统一越好。<font color="#245bdb">EOTF</font><font color="#2ea121">默认模式</font><font color="#6425d0">路径</font>calman（卡尔曼）-Open WorkFlow Template（开发工作流程模板）-Calibration（校准）-SDR-Manual Calibration（SDR 手动校准）。<img id="aimg_vUp8r" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="583" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWE1OWI0NjgxOTgyYjdhZjA5YTE5MTUyMmE4ZGE3OGZfNHprM1REbEVpZGpyeElOQkM2cjJ5R21KT2xtVGt4MlZfVG9rZW46SnFlSGJQVERFb2FpYVp4WHBrRGNTaWVBbmdlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWE1OWI0NjgxOTgyYjdhZjA5YTE5MTUyMmE4ZGE3OGZfNHprM1REbEVpZGpyeElOQkM2cjJ5R21KT2xtVGt4MlZfVG9rZW46SnFlSGJQVERFb2FpYVp4WHBrRGNTaWVBbmdlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><font color="#6425d0">数据</font><ul><li>黄色为标准值，灰色为实测值，两条曲线越贴合越好。</li><li>EOTF（电光转换函数）：是将数字信号转换成可见光的方式，显示设备使用它来将信号转变成光。拓展：OETF（光电转换函数）是将采集的线性光信号压缩成暗部细节更多的非线性电信号。</li><li>Luminance（亮度）：查看亮度是否存在漂移问题，查看不同亮度下曲线贴合程度。实测值高于标准值，画面显示更亮，实测值低于标准值，画面显示更暗。</li><li>还可以查看是否为逐级调教或者全局调教，前者优于后者。下拉框中可以选择不同的点进行测试，建议选择 256 个点。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_DERZr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="612" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjY2MmYzZmEwNjdmNmM2NDVhZjc1OTkyMGE3YTM5NzZfWHpuQzdMdzRGSkIxNE9JVlBPbkszZXp2cndxaDdScnNfVG9rZW46WG84dmJGaXBpb3pTQTd4clg5V2NGa3BLbm9oXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjY2MmYzZmEwNjdmNmM2NDVhZjc1OTkyMGE3YTM5NzZfWHpuQzdMdzRGSkIxNE9JVlBPbkszZXp2cndxaDdScnNfVG9rZW46WG84dmJGaXBpb3pTQTd4clg5V2NGa3BLbm9oXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><font color="#2ea121">暗场调校</font><font color="#6425d0">路径</font>calman（卡尔曼）-Open WorkFlow Template（开发工作流程模板）-Calibration（校准）-SDR-Manual Calibration（SDR 手动校准）。<img id="aimg_CY1hz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="583" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OGYzNmY0YjIyMGI4YTRkY2ZlYWMxYjgwZjkzY2M5ZWZfZnZ6TEFxQkJDa1lTaUc0ZkNOZlFiaU1xVmNwQ1ZWQnRfVG9rZW46VXdxWmJ3d2x1b0UyWVB4OGtmZGNXbFFMbkhoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OGYzNmY0YjIyMGI4YTRkY2ZlYWMxYjgwZjkzY2M5ZWZfZnZ6TEFxQkJDa1lTaUc0ZkNOZlFiaU1xVmNwQ1ZWQnRfVG9rZW46VXdxWmJ3d2x1b0UyWVB4OGtmZGNXbFFMbkhoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><font color="#6425d0">步骤</font>首先查看显示器 OSD 菜单中的暗场调校分为几级。 若为 100 级，需从 0 级每增加 10 级测试一次，若为-10 到+10 每级测试一次，若有固定等级每个测试一次，以上都要保存图片取名为对应级别。<img id="aimg_k48fx" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="612" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGNlNTU4ZjMyMTQxZjMwMWJjY2U3MzAwYWRhYWM5N2VfZW42cTZwYVk3RjE1ekdxTUx6dFRwOXFHd054MWNmUkJfVG9rZW46TUhBWWJmcDA1b2hzeEl4Y1dSSmNhRXpKbkNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZGNlNTU4ZjMyMTQxZjMwMWJjY2U3MzAwYWRhYWM5N2VfZW42cTZwYVk3RjE1ekdxTUx6dFRwOXFHd054MWNmUkJfVG9rZW46TUhBWWJmcDA1b2hzeEl4Y1dSSmNhRXpKbkNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><font color="#6425d0">数据</font>黄色为标准值，灰色为实测值，两条曲线越贴合越好。<ul><li>EOTF（电光转换函数）：是将数字信号转换成可见光的方式，显示设备使用它来将信号转变成光。拓展：OETF（光电转换函数）是将采集的线性光信号压缩成暗部细节更多的非线性电信号。</li><li>Luminance（亮度）：查看亮度是否存在漂移问题，查看不同亮度下曲线贴合程度。实测值高于标准值，画面显示更亮，实测值低于标准值，画面显示更暗。<br>
</li></ul>还可以查看是否为逐级调教或者全局调教，前者优于后者。下拉框中可以选择不同的点进行测试，建议选择 256 个点。<strong>十五、sRGB</strong><blockquote><strong>Calman软件+CA410设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong><strong>sRGB色彩空间</strong>：通俗点叫做sRGB缩限模式，将显示器切换到 sRGB 模式，所有测试参数使用 sRGB 参数，其他操作同默认模式。<strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong>色准<img id="aimg_eo94O" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="609" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDJjMmU4ZGQ1OWQxMWJjOTZlNjM3OGIxOWY1NTU5MTdfTXo0bjU2UWljdUtPek1uUkFTNW9NR253RUc4cUt0NDZfVG9rZW46SEZiSmJGMUFUb1REM2J4RllyUmNlVHFQblhjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" id="aimg_GFS4x" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="586" Gamut</strong>）路径白点值<img id="aimg_H0CiR" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="835" height="471" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzU3YzQ1MTEyYzg4OTg1NjIzOWYyNDhmOWUyMjEzNDhfNlAwWEYxaDFVWlF0WDBSeUlLVE42ZTNBbXNtOTd1dmhfVG9rZW46SlplV2JmNkNlbzAxZUt4U0pWQmNtYW80blNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzU3YzQ1MTEyYzg4OTg1NjIzOWYyNDhmOWUyMjEzNDhfNlAwWEYxaDFVWlF0WDBSeUlLVE42ZTNBbXNtOTd1dmhfVG9rZW46SlplV2JmNkNlbzAxZUt4U0pWQmNtYW80blNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>白点值：3D LUT</strong>）路径Gamma<img id="aimg_JQL4e" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="806" height="445" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjIxNDdiYWIwMDAyOWEzNjI5MDA3MzQ5ZDJmMjM5MWVfNXZ4TDhQSE13dGluU1k3T1I3RlhaNzFVb2ZxZVF3Tk5fVG9rZW46THV5bmJYQXIyb0NNZHJ4ZUpuZWNrdE9rbnlkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjIxNDdiYWIwMDAyOWEzNjI5MDA3MzQ5ZDJmMjM5MWVfNXZ4TDhQSE13dGluU1k3T1I3RlhaNzFVb2ZxZVF3Tk5fVG9rZW46THV5bmJYQXIyb0NNZHJ4ZUpuZWNrdE9rbnlkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>Gamma 值/Gamma 曲线/伽马</strong>）路径亮度对比度<img id="aimg_iHnjd" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="838" height="472" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWM1M2I0NmVjMDAwNTBkMThhMmJlMjJkYTE5NzcyNzhfdjlXQWtPYjE0dVdjaHRKQUhkcnhyRzh3QUM4cEdkaGlfVG9rZW46Wm5nUWJ0aFdub3JCUVl4TFY5TGM1cXNobng4XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWM1M2I0NmVjMDAwNTBkMThhMmJlMjJkYTE5NzcyNzhfdjlXQWtPYjE0dVdjaHRKQUhkcnhyRzh3QUM4cEdkaGlfVG9rZW46Wm5nUWJ0aFdub3JCUVl4TFY5TGM1cXNobng4XzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>亮度对比度 Contrast Ratio Tests</strong>）数据帧内对比度<img id="aimg_KV5Zq" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="835" height="468" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTVlYTEwYmZkOGY1NDM4MjliZDVhMDkyMzMxMjMzOWNfSXJrV2pJOG9UOUYwS24xdXV4VGNCRlVURTM3bHlnOG1fVG9rZW46R29PMWJsNHpDb1lySWp4emxDaGNzc0pDbjhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTVlYTEwYmZkOGY1NDM4MjliZDVhMDkyMzMxMjMzOWNfSXJrV2pJOG9UOUYwS24xdXV4VGNCRlVURTM3bHlnOG1fVG9rZW46R29PMWJsNHpDb1lySWp4emxDaGNzc0pDbjhiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>帧内对比度Intra-Frame Contrast</strong>）数据EOTF<img id="aimg_kFowf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="843" height="473" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzQ1NDhjNTQyZGZlOTI0ZTc4N2I4NjBlYTk1Mjc2YmZfU0h2NzFrejRTSFFrV093enFyQ2pDY0Y1UGFSU2gzODdfVG9rZW46S1Zqa2JzUkRPb3J3cVB4eVRuTmNhRU5ZblhjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzQ1NDhjNTQyZGZlOTI0ZTc4N2I4NjBlYTk1Mjc2YmZfU0h2NzFrejRTSFFrV093enFyQ2pDY0Y1UGFSU2gzODdfVG9rZW46S1Zqa2JzUkRPb3J3cVB4eVRuTmNhRU5ZblhjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA">上图为（<strong>DCI P3 色彩空间 EOTF 曲线</strong>）数据<strong>十八、HDR模式 I</strong><blockquote><strong>Calman软件+i1Pro 2设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>HDR 全称High-Dynamic Range（高动态光照渲染），由动态曝光控制和光晕效果两部分组成，能大幅提高画面细节的明暗对比度。 <ul><li><strong>HDR10：</strong>必须符合 4:2:0 颜色采样、10Bit 色深、BT2020 色彩空间，是最基础的HDR 标准。</li><li><strong>Dolby Vision：</strong>允许动态元数据一帧一帧地补充和适应 HDR 图像，可以更微妙地处理图像从而提高画面质量。</li><li><strong>HDR10 +：</strong>三星公司的HDR 标准，使用动态元数据来逐帧提升HDR 图像。</li><li><strong>HLG：</strong>混合对数伽玛曲线模式是最重要的HDR 格式，同时拍摄标准动态范围和高动态范围图像，结合成一个数据源。</li><li><strong>Advanced HDR by Technicolor：</strong>LG 与Technicolor 合作的产物，但 LG 是目前唯一一家支持该格式的厂商。</li><li><strong>DisplayHDR.：</strong>视频电子标准协会（VESA）专为 PC 显示器设定的HDR 标准，DisplayHDR 根据流明度、色域、色深和上升时间等特性的不同，目前主流分为三个等级 DisplayHDR 400 和 DisplayHDR 600 及 DisplayHDR 1000。需要注意的是，DisplayHDR 认证规范暂时仅针对 LCD 显示器，并不适用于OLED 面板的显示器，也不保证可以兼容现有的 HDR 内容和游戏。<ul><li><strong>DisplayHDR 400：</strong>必须支持 400nit 的峰值亮度、8Bit 色深、全局背光、色域对比度高于 SDR 即广色域。</li><li><strong>DisplayHDR 600：</strong>必须支持 600nit 的峰值亮度、10Bit 色深（可以是 8 抖 10）、分区背光、色域对比度高于 SDR 即广色域。</li><li><strong>DisplayHDR 1000：</strong>必须支持 1000nit 的峰值亮度、原生 10Bit 色深、分区背光、色域对比度高于 SDR 即广色域。<br>
<img id="aimg_aLHQ3" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="848" height="336" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmNmYzA5ZGVjMmJkYTFlNWQwZWYzNzExM2M5OTUzZDhfMUF5ZjFCakJuVk5HRzZBYWxDeE9xWlZPa0FDMHo1SHdfVG9rZW46VjVjeWJvUWx6b1g5R0F4MU9YYmN6azUwblBlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmNmYzA5ZGVjMmJkYTFlNWQwZWYzNzExM2M5OTUzZDhfMUF5ZjFCakJuVk5HRzZBYWxDeE9xWlZPa0FDMHo1SHdfVG9rZW46VjVjeWJvUWx6b1g5R0F4MU9YYmN6azUwblBlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li></ul><br>
</li></ul><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>准备两台显示器，要测试的一台设为副屏，另一台设置为主屏。</li><li>首先打开 madTPG 软件，点击 HDR 开关，并记录下 IP 地址，接着关闭 madTPG 软件。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_H3n22" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="876" height="447" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTk1MjFlYWU1N2RhYTRkOGU3MTkyYWI2MDM3OWE1OThfdGVYY0U1SU8xY3Zuc0N1bElodDZhM2pkS3V4ZkszTDBfVG9rZW46UE0zWWI0TlVnb0Zxcmt4aEI0UGNhRG9obmxkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTk1MjFlYWU1N2RhYTRkOGU3MTkyYWI2MDM3OWE1OThfdGVYY0U1SU8xY3Zuc0N1bElodDZhM2pkS3V4ZkszTDBfVG9rZW46UE0zWWI0TlVnb0Zxcmt4aEI0UGNhRG9obmxkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>在系统设置中开启 HDR，（设置-屏幕-屏幕-HDR）并且将显示器的 HDR 也开启，再次打开 madTPG 软件，并拖入要测试的屏幕上并最大话窗口。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_e3mrZ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="878" height="410" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDhjOWQ3ZmMzZjJjZmU1MTI5YWQ0OTk5OGU5ZmY0ZDdfYXFKeTVzVTh5ZHJZRFU4azVoSFN6SnBWN3RrSDc0R3JfVG9rZW46TVpXWGJ2eGdYbzY3ZFd4emJjbGNtakJvbnhnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDhjOWQ3ZmMzZjJjZmU1MTI5YWQ0OTk5OGU5ZmY0ZDdfYXFKeTVzVTh5ZHJZRFU4azVoSFN6SnBWN3RrSDc0R3JfVG9rZW46TVpXWGJ2eGdYbzY3ZFd4emJjbGNtakJvbnhnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 Calman 软件，再弹出窗口里的 Workflow（工作流）菜单项里选择（Analysis）HDR Toolkit（SDR 测试工具），点击 Start Session（开始）。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_Ld579" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="898" height="410" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzdiNWRkODIxY2NmMjE0M2M0Nzk1YTM3ZGE2MWY3MTNfWFZJVFdDWU0yZDFFMHVuWm1nd3VtcWIzTG50a0Z5WXpfVG9rZW46WGdSeGJ2YjBTb3Ziam94SEJDRGN5UENtblRoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MzdiNWRkODIxY2NmMjE0M2M0Nzk1YTM3ZGE2MWY3MTNfWFZJVFdDWU0yZDFFMHVuWm1nd3VtcWIzTG50a0Z5WXpfVG9rZW46WGdSeGJ2YjBTb3Ziam94SEJDRGN5UENtblRoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>设备连接正常会闪蓝灯，Calman 里第一个选项卡 Simulated（设备）也会显示设备名称，圆圈初始值为 240 且为蓝色，显示红色数值为 0 说明需要进行零电平校准，点击Initialize Meter 按钮，根据提示操作即可（也可参考测量光谱图中的校准步骤），校准完成后设备会显示白灯。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_y8oTt" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="881" height="430" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTljMDg5OGNiODk1OTQ3Y2JkZDc3MmEwNGFjNmU3ZGNfRVdhRllWV2xCMVdTeDdZSkpkdEFnYmdnV2I3MVF4SGlfVG9rZW46RUpaQmJMeFFwb2QyNUd4dmpLUmNwcVFEbm1jXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTljMDg5OGNiODk1OTQ3Y2JkZDc3MmEwNGFjNmU3ZGNfRVdhRllWV2xCMVdTeDdZSkpkdEFnYmdnV2I3MVF4SGlfVG9rZW46RUpaQmJMeFFwb2QyNUd4dmpLUmNwcVFEbm1jXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>确认设备连接校准无误后，切换到 Source（信号源）选项卡，点击Find Source（查找信号源）按钮，在弹出的窗口的子菜单 Manufacture（源）里选择 madVR Labs，Model（模式）里选择 madTPG Software，IP Address（IP 地址）里填写刚才记录的 IP 地址，最好点击 Connect（连接）按钮。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_mk144" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="884" height="482" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzRiNmU1YmRiNjRiN2VjNTBhYjA1NjYyOWJhNGE5MzVfRUlxcVpSMEdmd0M0NzBBS0wzYXoybmlMTWlmNFd2QlRfVG9rZW46V1U4WmJZRmFkbzdNNFR4ZXdDVGNtcHdiblRoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzRiNmU1YmRiNjRiN2VjNTBhYjA1NjYyOWJhNGE5MzVfRUlxcVpSMEdmd0M0NzBBS0wzYXoybmlMTWlmNFd2QlRfVG9rZW46V1U4WmJZRmFkbzdNNFR4ZXdDVGNtcHdiblRoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>确认信号源连接无误后，进行如下设置，Window Size（窗口大小）设置为 10%、Pattern Size（图案尺寸）设置为 100%、Pattern APL（图案模式）100%、HDR 勾选、Mastering Display Primaries（掌握显示原色）选择 BT.2020。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_voaDd" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="890" height="465" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjY4M2Q0OGJjMGUzYWJlZjdkN2NjYjU0MWUzYzA3OThfMUM3YjhQQld5dDdVUXJNVHRRSld5U0JUVWdlM1JHd2dfVG9rZW46Tm5CZGJjZHREb2VySFF4elh3SGNyYWdjbkdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjY4M2Q0OGJjMGUzYWJlZjdkN2NjYjU0MWUzYzA3OThfMUM3YjhQQld5dDdVUXJNVHRRSld5U0JUVWdlM1JHd2dfVG9rZW46Tm5CZGJjZHREb2VySFF4elh3SGNyYWdjbkdjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>确认无误后，进行如下测试。<ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>亮度<ul><li><strong>软件路径如下图：</strong>calman（卡尔曼）-Open WorkFlow Template（开发工作流程模板）-Analysis（分析）-HDR Toolkit（HDR 工具）。<br>
<img id="aimg_c9kq2" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="888" height="273" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjQzYzMzZWMxZDVjMjViOGE1NjU0MmU5NzYwNDc5OTZfdTYwZVU5QnU3a3JqbjlwekxKMElva0taa1Q0S3ZOVUJfVG9rZW46Rk5oeWJpMGNIbzhpQmZ4UDZaSWNKb2UzbnhnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjQzYzMzZWMxZDVjMjViOGE1NjU0MmU5NzYwNDc5OTZfdTYwZVU5QnU3a3JqbjlwekxKMElva0taa1Q0S3ZOVUJfVG9rZW46Rk5oeWJpMGNIbzhpQmZ4UDZaSWNKb2UzbnhnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li><li><strong>软件操作如下图：</strong>点击 Target Options（目标选择）做如下设置，Colorspace（色彩空间）设置为 rec.2020、Whitepoint（白点值）设置为 D65、Gamma Formula（伽马公式）设置为 ST 2048 HDR（PQ）、dE Charts（色准图表）设置为 ITP。<br>
<img id="aimg_Uuo1h" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="399" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjQxN2Q5NWJmMTA2NmI0ZWVlM2EwZDA0NWNmYzMzZWJfZFl3c2c4Zzk0RDNydjVOR2l0bWFKeVVKZVI2WDdVR1RfVG9rZW46VjdXMWJwQXBab3Yyd0Z4VnBObWM0d2c3bnVZXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjQxN2Q5NWJmMTA2NmI0ZWVlM2EwZDA0NWNmYzMzZWJfZFl3c2c4Zzk0RDNydjVOR2l0bWFKeVVKZVI2WDdVR1RfVG9rZW46VjdXMWJwQXBab3Yyd0Z4VnBObWM0d2c3bnVZXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li><li><strong>设备摆放如下图：</strong>确认设备摆放正确，置于测试屏幕的正中间，且与屏幕保持贴合。<br>
<img id="aimg_Ans6s" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="872" height="463" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDg3NjIxMmY3OWRmNDRiMWZiOTMzZTA0YTc0YmE3NDBfeHpsUHJBS3V4RHdwOTJBN2MyZDcyZnhZSFE4dllocW1fVG9rZW46UGd2RmJWU0plb2ZJbWt4U2ZESmM2cmFtbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDg3NjIxMmY3OWRmNDRiMWZiOTMzZTA0YTc0YmE3NDBfeHpsUHJBS3V4RHdwOTJBN2MyZDcyZnhZSFE4dllocW1fVG9rZW46UGd2RmJWU0plb2ZJbWt4U2ZESmM2cmFtbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li><li><strong>正式测试如下图：</strong>点击 Peak vs. Window Size（峰值与窗口大小），点击 Run Test 按钮。<br>
<img id="aimg_n9ahh" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="877" height="438" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWU4YWYwNWY2OGE2MjkxOTNhYWU0NTNlOTJkMDZlOWRfNEJHUXZ2aDhVeTJFMFE3Q2RTUmpzR0doVU8zM0NvTGlfVG9rZW46S1pNSWJNV1Exb0N1TVR4ZW9EVmNwVlJBbkpmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWU4YWYwNWY2OGE2MjkxOTNhYWU0NTNlOTJkMDZlOWRfNEJHUXZ2aDhVeTJFMFE3Q2RTUmpzR0doVU8zM0NvTGlfVG9rZW46S1pNSWJNV1Exb0N1TVR4ZW9EVmNwVlJBbkpmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li><li><strong>对于数据的解读：</strong>Current Reading（当前数值）即为 HDR 下的峰值亮度，黄色的线视作为其亮度的稳定性，越水平代表越稳定。需要注意的是 10%以内的亮度有肯能因为设备摆放未处于中心点，导致数值偏差较大或者没有数据，就需要正确摆放设备后重新测试。<br>
<img id="aimg_vpDdo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="895" height="463" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWY5OTg3MjBlZmM5MjNmMDZjYzNkYzljMTNmZTI0Y2VfUlBxNHd6S0M5T3piVDhxSFY5bmJXZ2FpUXdva0Z2RnFfVG9rZW46Vm1tbGI1U0xMb3hRb0p4T1hlMGNMY0ZMbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWY5OTg3MjBlZmM5MjNmMDZjYzNkYzljMTNmZTI0Y2VfUlBxNHd6S0M5T3piVDhxSFY5bmJXZ2FpUXdva0Z2RnFfVG9rZW46Vm1tbGI1U0xMb3hRb0p4T1hlMGNMY0ZMbjVlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li></ul></li><li>EOTF<ul><li><strong>软件路径如下图：</strong>calman（卡尔曼）-Open WorkFlow Template（开发工作流程）-Calibration（校准）-HDR-Manual Calibration（HDR 手动校准）。<br>
<img id="aimg_zvG6v" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="896" height="340" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzM1NDk3MmIzZDA3OTljMWU1Y2JmYmZkY2VjM2E4NDhfbERpckpKejNCUmxuZGZkV1Fqc3JRRGE0UktIWjZJek9fVG9rZW46VDdxWmJoYW1Eb0ZPZnp4b3RnWGNNZjR0bm9iXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzM1NDk3MmIzZDA3OTljMWU1Y2JmYmZkY2VjM2E4NDhfbERpckpKejNCUmxuZGZkV1Fqc3JRRGE0UktIWjZJek9fVG9rZW46VDdxWmJoYW1Eb0ZPZnp4b3RnWGNNZjR0bm9iXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li><li><strong>软件参数设置：</strong>同测量亮度的参数。<br>
<img id="aimg_P1m5S" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="399" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2RkNWMyMjU2ZmJmZTlhZGQ2MTA5ZTI2ZmI4YTYxYWRfcHdyQnVqWmc5MzNOeUQzd0o5RGVEMGhzek11am85MVVfVG9rZW46VUV3cmJvZlNRb2JyZjR4dTBZWGNKQzhWbktlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=M2RkNWMyMjU2ZmJmZTlhZGQ2MTA5ZTI2ZmI4YTYxYWRfcHdyQnVqWmc5MzNOeUQzd0o5RGVEMGhzek11am85MVVfVG9rZW46VUV3cmJvZlNRb2JyZjR4dTBZWGNKQzhWbktlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li><li><strong>对数据的解读：</strong><ul><li>黄色为标准值，灰色为实测值，两条曲线越贴合越好。</li><li>EOTF（电光转换函数）：是将数字信号转换成可见光的方式，显示设备使用它来将信号转变成光。拓展：OETF（光电转换函数）是将采集的线性光信号压缩成暗部细节更多的非线性电信号。</li><li>Luminance（亮度）：查看亮度是否存在漂移问题，查看不同亮度下曲线贴合程度。实测值高于标准值，画面显示更亮，实测值低于标准值，画面显示更暗。<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;还可以查看是否为逐级调教或者全局调教，前者优于后者。下拉框中可以选择不同的点进行测试，建议选择 256 个点。</li></ul><br>
<img id="aimg_P7rZN" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="917" height="513" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjIxM2YzMmExYmYyZDQ0OTdhMWZjOGZkYTUxZDEwZWVfUU0zOGU3Y3ZjanJaZE9EMjN0a08wTzJWTm9QUnNvRWxfVG9rZW46TXZ3R2JpVmEwb2kyaHN4ZXJ5aGNXZGZTbjNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjIxM2YzMmExYmYyZDQ0OTdhMWZjOGZkYTUxZDEwZWVfUU0zOGU3Y3ZjanJaZE9EMjN0a08wTzJWTm9QUnNvRWxfVG9rZW46TXZ3R2JpVmEwb2kyaHN4ZXJ5aGNXZGZTbjNjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"></li></ul><br>
</li></ul><br>
</li></ul><strong>十九、HDR模式 II</strong><blockquote><strong>Calman软件+CA410设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>使用 i1Pro 2 设备测试完HDR 亮度和 EOTF（PQ）曲线后，将设备更换为 CA410，此设备连接、零电平校准、软件路径、测试参数、数据解读同上，此处掠过，需要测试 HDR 常用色准、BT.2020 色准、DCI P3 色域、BT.2020 色域、BT.709 色域这五项。<strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>HDR 常用色准<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_qq515" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="899" height="488" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTE0YmMxMWYyNTYzZDU2YWJjYmE4NWZlNGFiNDMzZjJfdVN0TjN6cG9DaTlqczVRc2pHMWF1VzBXRGRUNG8wVWFfVG9rZW46UG5QbmJEanNob0hvbHJ4TFIzNGNHSTBmbkVjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTE0YmMxMWYyNTYzZDU2YWJjYmE4NWZlNGFiNDMzZjJfdVN0TjN6cG9DaTlqczVRc2pHMWF1VzBXRGRUNG8wVWFfVG9rZW46UG5QbmJEanNob0hvbHJ4TFIzNGNHSTBmbkVjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>BT.2020 色准（激光投影摄影使用）<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_co090" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="900" height="324" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OWIzYjA5ZDhiZjI5NTRlMTNhZDYyODdjNjdkMjZlN2JfTWUxMWtSMjVNQzdNWTJDWEUxdVhrOU9WNm9ZYVhiaUZfVG9rZW46SWhqc2JubUdzb3VoOUp4MzJMeGNRZ3ZRbmxoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OWIzYjA5ZDhiZjI5NTRlMTNhZDYyODdjNjdkMjZlN2JfTWUxMWtSMjVNQzdNWTJDWEUxdVhrOU9WNm9ZYVhiaUZfVG9rZW46SWhqc2JubUdzb3VoOUp4MzJMeGNRZ3ZRbmxoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>BT.2020 色 域<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_DBATh" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="912" height="493" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjU2NmFhNTgzYzcxMzc1YWU2YWQzYjM5MTZkZTAzYjBfdXZhaVVSMzE0OHQ5eDEzcHd6SFkwNVhTQUdVRnZSWXNfVG9rZW46WWlxTWJacXpUb1RRVnd4a04wMWNFUVBvbnNoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjU2NmFhNTgzYzcxMzc1YWU2YWQzYjM5MTZkZTAzYjBfdXZhaVVSMzE0OHQ5eDEzcHd6SFkwNVhTQUdVRnZSWXNfVG9rZW46WWlxTWJacXpUb1RRVnd4a04wMWNFUVBvbnNoXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>DCI P3 色 域<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_BUTcM" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="913" height="492" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWE5MWI3MDEzZDcyMzliODk0YjFiZWJhYzljZGNhODBfb2VWTkdiempFeFdVM3lrOUkxeEFQMkFycjU3bFczUGVfVG9rZW46VG9zc2JRRWRNb1djNnh4MUpQbWN5SlhrblliXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWE5MWI3MDEzZDcyMzliODk0YjFiZWJhYzljZGNhODBfb2VWTkdiempFeFdVM3lrOUkxeEFQMkFycjU3bFczUGVfVG9rZW46VG9zc2JRRWRNb1djNnh4MUpQbWN5SlhrblliXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>BT.709 色 域<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_vuhr9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="917" height="493" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDI1YjdjMDJmN2JlMDNiNDkzMDc2ZTQ1NTE1NzRiMDhfZGR3RDFWNlRYMnFoS2dxcUhLT0huMjNpUlR0TzlNaXBfVG9rZW46VUYwTmJYMFFlb0Jnb014cTN5Q2NzclJIbldnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZDI1YjdjMDJmN2JlMDNiNDkzMDc2ZTQ1NTE1NzRiMDhfZGR3RDFWNlRYMnFoS2dxcUhLT0huMjNpUlR0TzlNaXBfVG9rZW46VUYwTmJYMFFlb0Jnb014cTN5Q2NzclJIbldnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong>二十、校色文件</strong><blockquote><strong>i1Profiler软件 + i1Pro 2设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 理论知识</font></strong>Monitor Calibration 颜色校正是为了将显示器的显示效果矫正到同一个颜色标准上，Windwos 系统标准的参数为：D65+2.2+120nit；不过由于 120nit 可能会导致画面观感偏暗，可以直接设为 180nit，我们这里使用当前亮度（既测试环境开灯后检测到的亮度）作为校准值。液晶显示器随着使用时间增加背光 LED 不可避免会发生老化，导致色衰现象，因此定期校色也是不可或缺的。<ul><li><strong>硬件校色：</strong>即使更换主机或系统依然能够保持显示器专业色准。</li><li><strong>软件校色：</strong>使用校色仪配合对应软件进行校色，校色完成会生成icc 文件，系统只要加载校色文件就可以让 PC 输出经过校色的图像信号，但这种做法改变的是显卡输出信号导致色彩精度有所损失，而且不是所有程序都能对icc 文件生效。<br>
</li></ul><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 操作步骤</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>打开 i1Profiler 软件，选择显示器色彩管理、默认显示设备选择i1Pro 2。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_s49OR" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="900" height="475" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODdjZTJhMjYzNzU4MjJkNDVkN2I3MTQwOTRkODhiNTNfcE5mOVEzZzNmcmtNYW1zWGFHZXJ1OWxHRlRtSURzaWVfVG9rZW46VEtzcmI5bzRyb21JTml4RjFDbGM3bjZablNkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODdjZTJhMjYzNzU4MjJkNDVkN2I3MTQwOTRkODhiNTNfcE5mOVEzZzNmcmtNYW1zWGFHZXJ1OWxHRlRtSURzaWVfVG9rZW46VEtzcmI5bzRyb21JTml4RjFDbGM3bjZablNkXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>按红框里的参数进行设置，确认显示器型号、白点选择CIE 光源 D65、亮度选择本机、伽马选择标准默认 2.2，显示器配置由自动感光功能的勾选环境光源智能控制就是检测当下的环境亮度，没有的略过，最后点击下一步。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_ZCM44" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="907" height="480" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MWY2MDg0MzU3MzJmOWMyYTU1NjhmNGVkZDI2MjYwNTlfeEQ0QjhPdk1kUkQxckVmUnBSNlRheXNuQVM5Tnl1aUJfVG9rZW46VmdTV2JvZ3RHb0JvU1h4ZWJCR2NOTVpBbjJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MWY2MDg0MzU3MzJmOWMyYTU1NjhmNGVkZDI2MjYwNTlfeEQ0QjhPdk1kUkQxckVmUnBSNlRheXNuQVM5Tnl1aUJfVG9rZW46VmdTV2JvZ3RHb0JvU1h4ZWJCR2NOTVpBbjJnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>首先查看设备管理器中设备是否为 i1 Pro，是的话返回软件点击重新连接。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_SDvv9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="415" height="330" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTlkZjdjY2IyNjYyODM2YjlmMTkxM2Q2YWE0Njk5NDJfa1Q5SkRLdE1vQlNmajJyZFprZE1nTlJxOWhOSEVwUUxfVG9rZW46S1BDUmJINkREb2hHR0Z4NndIQWNTSFdXbmZiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZTlkZjdjY2IyNjYyODM2YjlmMTkxM2Q2YWE0Njk5NDJfa1Q5SkRLdE1vQlNmajJyZFprZE1nTlJxOWhOSEVwUUxfVG9rZW46S1BDUmJINkREb2hHR0Z4NndIQWNTSFdXbmZiXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>设备连接后需要进行零电平校准，按如果所示摆放设备，或者参考测量光谱时的校准步骤。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_lpM2u" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="911" height="460" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWZhMjhiOGZjMTM2ZjY2MDVlMjRiMzJjZWRkMGQzODdfTlFkd2tSelE1TmgybG10d0tIVEdRd0lIT1loaVNscE9fVG9rZW46WnlPU2JHblVlb3d5WlV4VkNOcGNUQk5zblVjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWZhMjhiOGZjMTM2ZjY2MDVlMjRiMzJjZWRkMGQzODdfTlFkd2tSelE1TmgybG10d0tIVEdRd0lIT1loaVNscE9fVG9rZW46WnlPU2JHblVlb3d5WlV4VkNOcGNUQk5zblVjXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击开始测量。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_gBE9E" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="911" height="423" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDMyOWI5MjFlMGQ3MGExNDAyM2ZjOTBkYTM0YzZiMDVfb1pJdk9GR090V2xxcHhSS3BLelBpR0xJS1hoYnljdHlfVG9rZW46RUlmRmJ0cUFrb2NNVlF4WHRWaWNqZzhTbm1jXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDMyOWI5MjFlMGQ3MGExNDAyM2ZjOTBkYTM0YzZiMDVfb1pJdk9GR090V2xxcHhSS3BLelBpR0xJS1hoYnljdHlfVG9rZW46RUlmRmJ0cUFrb2NNVlF4WHRWaWNqZzhTbm1jXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>按如果所示将i1Pro 2 置于显示器的中间，保持设备和屏幕的贴合。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_rwpn6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="914" height="469" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWUzMGIyZDMyN2E3MTczZWMzYTNiMmE3MmQ2YTk2NjRfYzFuZzFpU2FHVmJGTkdCUlBnRGNSOTdrUDlqenJaWkZfVG9rZW46V2pxb2JmU2FRb3pCSHF4VXR2aGNFMHd2bm9mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWUzMGIyZDMyN2E3MTczZWMzYTNiMmE3MmQ2YTk2NjRfYzFuZzFpU2FHVmJGTkdCUlBnRGNSOTdrUDlqenJaWkZfVG9rZW46V2pxb2JmU2FRb3pCSHF4VXR2aGNFMHd2bm9mXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>点击 OK 在点击下一步。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_d2Kn6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="806" height="368" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjU3YTcxNTNhZDZmNWU5ODc5NmUyNWIzYTFiOTlkNmRfRE9pZHFPTTdlN1lPdGs4WUVVak5oQzR5SkFwajBObTFfVG9rZW46RkZFZWJSWFlNb2swUHd4OFdycWNNU2kzbjRlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjU3YTcxNTNhZDZmNWU5ODc5NmUyNWIzYTFiOTlkNmRfRE9pZHFPTTdlN1lPdGs4WUVVak5oQzR5SkFwajBObTFfVG9rZW46RkZFZWJSWFlNb2swUHd4OFdycWNNU2kzbjRlXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>以显示器型号命名校色文件，点击保存配置文件即可。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_CgspH" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="910" height="377" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzUxNTMwOWY3NzRmNjIwMzQwNTZmYTYyNjdjNzU3ODBfdnJjSVJUQW43UXZjbzQ1Z2xhMjY0WURYcnR4ZUxUWkxfVG9rZW46T21uTWJlOVpmb24zSVh4RDZCRGNsYTFpblNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzUxNTMwOWY3NzRmNjIwMzQwNTZmYTYyNjdjNzU3ODBfdnJjSVJUQW43UXZjbzQ1Z2xhMjY0WURYcnR4ZUxUWkxfVG9rZW46T21uTWJlOVpmb24zSVh4RDZCRGNsYTFpblNmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>将配置文件复制到对应型号文件夹里留存，最后将 icc 配置文件上传到网盘的对应文件夹里。<br>
</li></ul><strong>二十一、校色后验证</strong><blockquote><strong>Calman软件+CA410设备</strong></blockquote><strong><font color="#245bdb">① 校色应用</font></strong><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>在系统设置中搜索颜色管理并打开。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_w5Jk8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="780" height="514" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmYyN2I2ODNhZTNhNjA2NzNmOWY1MzkyZWQ1NWM5MDFfeWNwd0EySGp2UkFSSWY4SFdkUDdHWk95NU1IVjA4QzhfVG9rZW46Q2NsSWJMSVRVb1JPNEx4VU9sTmNRakNnbnVnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MmYyN2I2ODNhZTNhNjA2NzNmOWY1MzkyZWQ1NWM5MDFfeWNwd0EySGp2UkFSSWY4SFdkUDdHWk95NU1IVjA4QzhfVG9rZW46Q2NsSWJMSVRVb1JPNEx4VU9sTmNRakNnbnVnXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><ul type="1" class="litype_1"><li>确认设备为需要校准的显示器，点击添加按钮，选择刚才保存的 icc 校色文件。<br>
</li></ul><img id="aimg_KEd5f" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="723" height="638" file="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDRmNTkyYmVkOWZmMjQ1ODNmNDg5NTNlNTNhZWEwZTFfM3VWRFNQRVNBMjdsU1NSZ2VwZEloMVFTN1ROazByNlhfVG9rZW46VkhodmJvbmhOb2JlcWF4cGVFR2M3YWdqbldmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA" border="0" alt="" src="https://x-imagine.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDRmNTkyYmVkOWZmMjQ1ODNmNDg5NTNlNTNhZWEwZTFfM3VWRFNQRVNBMjdsU1NSZ2VwZEloMVFTN1ROazByNlhfVG9rZW46VkhodmJvbmhOb2JlcWF4cGVFR2M3YWdqbldmXzE3Mzk3NjI4MzM6MTczOTc2NjQzM19WNA"><strong><font color="#245bdb">② 测试项目</font></strong>系统应用校色文件后，使用 sRGB 的参数重新测试色准、色域、白点值、Gamma、 EOTF 这五个项目，操作同上此处略过。</td></tr></tbody></table>
